original: 'on kyang rjes su 'gro ba med pa la sogs pa gtan tshigs nyid kyi skyon yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang rjes su 'gro ba med pa la sogs pa gtan tshigs nyid kyi skyon yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the reason is faulty because it does not pervade,

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: then that is not so,

original: rjes su 'gro ba ni mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ni mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the pervasion is the same.

original: rjes su 'gro ba ni 'brel pa yin la de yang gnyis la gnas pa'i phyir gnyi ga'i yang yin no //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba ni 'brel pa yin la de yang gnyis la gnas pa'i phyir gnyi ga'i yang yin no //
translated: Pervasion is the relation, and that is based on the two, so it belongs to both.

original: ci sta yang bsgrub bya la ltos te de bzhin du ma grub pa ni phyogs kyi skyon yin gyi /
analyzed: ci sta yang bsgrub bya la ltos te de bzhin du ma grub pa ni phyogs kyi skyon yin gyi /
translated: But if it is not established in that way in dependence on the probandum, then that is a fault of the position.

original: sgrub par byed pa la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not in dependence on the proof.

original: sgrub par byed pa la ltos pa ni sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi skyon yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa la ltos pa ni sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi skyon yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is in dependence on the proof, then that is a fault of the proof itself.

original: 'di la bshad zin to //üîΩgal te gnyi ga phan tshun ltos nas sgrub par byed pa yin na ni ci ltar phyogs @197a * //
analyzed: 'di la bshad zin to // gal te gnyi ga phan tshun ltos nas sgrub par byed pa yin na ni ci ltar phyogs @197a * //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: kyi skyon yin /
analyzed: kyi skyon yin /
translated: If both are proofs in mutual dependence, then how is it a fault of the position?

original: chos can chos sgrub pa la bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa tsam gyis tshogs pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di nges pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: chos can chos sgrub pa la bsgrub par bya ba dang 'brel pa tsam gyis tshogs pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di nges pa yang ma yin te /
translated: In the proof of a subject's property, the mere relationship between the probandum and the proof is not the collection of the proof.

original: rang gi ngo bo kho nar bstan par bya ba zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo kho nar bstan par bya ba zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is not certain, because the subject's own nature is what is to be indicated.

original: 'o na ji ltar chos can ma grub na grub ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar chos can ma grub na grub ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad ce na /
translated: Well then, how is it that you explained, If the subject is not established, it is impossible for it to be established?

original: gzhi ma grub pas na de la gtan tshigs nyid mi srid do snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhi ma grub pas na de la gtan tshigs nyid mi srid do snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
translated: The idea is that because the basis is not established, it is impossible for it to be the proof.

original: des na ma grub pa'i chos dang chos can gyi spyi yang phyogs nyid do //üîΩdes na gtan tshigs la mi ltos pa nyid kyi skyon ni phyogs kyi skyon yin no //
analyzed: des na ma grub pa'i chos dang chos can gyi spyi yang phyogs nyid do // des na gtan tshigs la mi ltos pa nyid kyi skyon ni phyogs kyi skyon yin no //
translated: Therefore, the nonestablished subject and the nonestablished property of the subject are also the subject.üîΩTherefore, the fault of not depending on the proof is a fault of the subject.

original: des na / yan lag phyi ma la ltos skyon//üîΩgang yin de yi rjes byed pas //
analyzed: des na / yan lag phyi ma la ltos skyon// gang yin de yi rjes byed pas //
translated: The fault that depends on the latter partüîΩis explained to be that.

original: de yin zhes bshad de yi phyir //
analyzed: de yin zhes bshad de yi phyir //
translated: Therefore,

original: rten sogs ma grub phyogs skyon min //
analyzed: rten sogs ma grub phyogs skyon min //
translated: the fault of the nonestablished basis and so on is not a fault of the subject.

original: 'di ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di ni bshad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: yan lag phyi ma la ltos pa //
analyzed: yan lag phyi ma la ltos pa //
translated: The fault of the position does not arise

original: phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur ma yin //
translated: in dependence on the later part.

original: de lta min na rgyu sogs kyi //
analyzed: de lta min na rgyu sogs kyi //
translated: If it were otherwise, then the fault of the reason, etc.,

original: skyon yang phyogs skyon thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: skyon yang phyogs skyon thal bar 'gyur //
translated: would also be a fault of the position,

original: thams cad phyogs la gnod phyir ro //üîΩdes na de tsam dang 'brel ba //
analyzed: thams cad phyogs la gnod phyir ro // des na de tsam dang 'brel ba //
translated: because all are faulty with respect to the position.üîΩTherefore, the fault of the position is only

original: phyogs kyi skyon yin gzhan min te //
analyzed: phyogs kyi skyon yin gzhan min te //
translated: in connection with that much, not otherwise,

original: mngon sum la sogs gnod pa bzhin //
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs gnod pa bzhin //
translated: just as with the contradiction of perception, etc.

original: zhes so des na gzhi ma grub pa ni phyogs kyi skyon ma yin no zhes rigs so //
analyzed: zhes so des na gzhi ma grub pa ni phyogs kyi skyon ma yin no zhes rigs so //
translated: Thus, it is reasonable to say that an unestablished base is not a fault of the position.

original: gal te sgra mnyan bya ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te sgra mnyan bya ma yin no //
translated: If one says that sound is not audible,

original: bum pa rtag pa'o zhes bya ba dang / rjes su dpag pa ni tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: bum pa rtag pa'o zhes bya ba dang / rjes su dpag pa ni tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: that a pot is permanent, or that inference is not a means of valid cognition,

original: ri bong can ni zla ba ma yin no zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
analyzed: ri bong can ni zla ba ma yin no zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
translated: or that the rabbit-bearer is not the moon,

original: chos kyi rang gi ngo bo phyin ci log pa'i gnod pa nyid bstan pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: chos kyi rang gi ngo bo phyin ci log pa'i gnod pa nyid bstan pa ma yin nam /
translated: is this not teaching a contradiction of the intrinsic reality of the property?

original: chos can dang chos kyi khyad par dang / chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo la gnod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can dang chos kyi khyad par dang / chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo la gnod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not a contradiction of the property, the property-possessor, the distinction of the property-possessor, or the intrinsic reality of the property-possessor.

original: dpe ma bstan par ni bde blag tu rtogs pa yang ma yin pa de la 'dir rgyu ci yod ce na /
analyzed: dpe ma bstan par ni bde blag tu rtogs pa yang ma yin pa de la 'dir rgyu ci yod ce na /
translated: If the example is not taught, then it is not easy to understand. What is the reason for that?

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: 'dis sgrub yan lag gyur pa yi //
analyzed: 'dis sgrub yan lag gyur pa yi //
translated: By this, the means of proofüîΩand the property of the subject,

original: chos can chos kyi khyad par dang // chos can rang gi ngo bo la //
analyzed: chos can chos kyi khyad par dang // chos can rang gi ngo bo la //
translated: and the contradiction of the nature of the subject

original: gnod pa dag ni bstan pa yin //
analyzed: gnod pa dag ni bstan pa yin //
translated: are taught.

original: chos kyi rang gi ngo bo bzlog pa ston pa lhur byed pa'i dpe 'di nyid kyis rang gi ngo bo dang khyad par thams cad bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi rang gi ngo bo bzlog pa ston pa lhur byed pa'i dpe 'di nyid kyis rang gi ngo bo dang khyad par thams cad bstan pa yin no //
translated: By this very example, which emphasizes the negation of the nature of the property, all natures and distinctions are taught.

original: ci ltar gzhan gyis gzhan bstan ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar gzhan gyis gzhan bstan ce na /
translated: How can one teach one thing by another?

original: bsgrub bya nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub bya nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no distinction in the object of proof.

original: de la gsal ba so sor ni dper brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la gsal ba so sor ni dper brjod par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: In that case, it is not possible to give an example for each individual case.

original: de la nye bar bstan pa la ni dgos pa yang med de /
analyzed: de la nye bar bstan pa la ni dgos pa yang med de /
translated: And there is no purpose in teaching an example there,

original: dper brjod pa gcig bstan pas chos de bde bar shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dper brjod pa gcig bstan pas chos de bde bar shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because by teaching one example, that property is easily understood.

original: @197b dper brjod pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin no //
analyzed: @197b dper brjod pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin no //
translated: The example is merely an illustration.

original: gal te chos dang chos can gyi khyad par ci ltar chos der 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te chos dang chos can gyi khyad par ci ltar chos der 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If you ask, ‚ÄúHow can there be a property-possessor without a property?‚Äù

original: de ni smras pa la ltos nas khyad par yin no //
analyzed: de ni smras pa la ltos nas khyad par yin no //
translated: It is a property-possessor in dependence on the property.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni de nyid yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni de nyid yin te /
translated: The property-possessor is the very same thing that is to be proven.

original: gzhan du sgrub par byed pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du sgrub par byed pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the proof would be pointless.

original: des na don ni bstan pa yi //üîΩdon du dpe ni phyogs tsam brjod //
analyzed: des na don ni bstan pa yi // don du dpe ni phyogs tsam brjod //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the statementüîΩis expressed in the example.

original: ldan don rdzas kyi mtshan nyid can //
analyzed: ldan don rdzas kyi mtshan nyid can //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúendowed‚Äù is the definition of substance.

original: mthong ba la brten gzhan yod min //
analyzed: mthong ba la brten gzhan yod min //
translated: It is not seen in dependence on another.

original: ma mthong khyad par can yin na //
analyzed: ma mthong khyad par can yin na //
translated: If it is a qualifier, it is not seen.

original: dam bca' ba la sogs pa med //
analyzed: dam bca' ba la sogs pa med //
translated: Then there would be no thesis, etc.

original: khyad par can min gzhan yod ni //
analyzed: khyad par can min gzhan yod ni //
translated: If it is a qualifier, it is not seen.

original: bsgrub na grub pa sgrub pa nyid //
analyzed: bsgrub na grub pa sgrub pa nyid //
translated: If it is established, it is just the establishment of what is already established.

original: dper brjod pa ni 'di dag ste //
analyzed: dper brjod pa ni 'di dag ste //
translated: These are the examples:

original: yan lag can ni yan lag dag las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: yan lag can ni yan lag dag las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: The whole is not different from the parts,

original: srad dma' ba'i khyad par 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: srad dma' ba'i khyad par 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not possess the characteristics of the parts.

original: yan lag ni yan lag can las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: yan lag ni yan lag can las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: The parts are not different from the whole,

original: mngon sum ma yin pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum ma yin pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that they are not directly perceptible.

original: rdzas ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rdzas ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Substance does not exist,

original: yon tan dang rdzas dag dang rdzas ma yin par thal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yon tan dang rdzas dag dang rdzas ma yin par thal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya'o //
translated: because it would follow that substance would be both a quality and a substance, and also not a substance.

original: chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo sel bas ni phyi ma shos cig yin la /
analyzed: chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo sel bas ni phyi ma shos cig yin la /
translated: The exclusion of the own nature of the subject is the latter.

original: chos can dang chos kyi khyad par sel bas ni go rims bzhin du //
analyzed: chos can dang chos kyi khyad par sel bas ni go rims bzhin du //
translated: The exclusion of the subject and the distinction of the quality are, respectively,

original: dang po'i dper brjod pa gnyis yin no //
analyzed: dang po'i dper brjod pa gnyis yin no //
translated: the first two examples.

original: gang zhig gang gi rang bzhin las //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi rang bzhin las //
translated: That which is different from the nature of something

original: tha dad de ni de bzhin dmigs //
analyzed: tha dad de ni de bzhin dmigs //
translated: is perceived as that.

original: de yi ngo bor dmigs med na //
analyzed: de yi ngo bor dmigs med na //
translated: If it is not perceived as its nature,

original: tha dad par ni grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: tha dad par ni grub mi 'gyur //
translated: it is not established as different.

original: tha dad par dmigs pa med pa ni tha dad par mngon sum du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad par dmigs pa med pa ni tha dad par mngon sum du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: That which is not perceived as different is not established as different.

original: tha dad pa med par dmigs pa dang / tha dad par khas len pa des na 'di ni 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa med par dmigs pa dang / tha dad par khas len pa des na 'di ni 'gal ba yin no //
translated: The perception of non-difference and the assertion of difference are contradictory.

original: gal te yan lag gzhan yin no //
analyzed: gal te yan lag gzhan yin no //
translated: If it is different,

original: mngon sum nyid yin gnod pa med //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid yin gnod pa med //
translated: it is perception, and there is no contradiction.

original: gang du yan lag can mngon sum //
analyzed: gang du yan lag can mngon sum //
translated: Where the whole is perceived,

original: de dngos de dag kyang de bzhin //
analyzed: de dngos de dag kyang de bzhin //
translated: those parts are also perceived.

original: de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin te /
translated: It is not so.

original: yan lag can mngon sum yin yang yan lag mngon sum ma yin na ni /
analyzed: yan lag can mngon sum yin yang yan lag mngon sum ma yin na ni /
translated: If the part-possessor is perceived but the parts are not perceived,

original: gzhan ma yin pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then they are not non-different.

original: yang na yan lag dag ni yan lag can las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na yan lag dag ni yan lag can las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, the parts are not different from the part-possessor,

original: mngon sum ma yin bar thal ba'i phyir ro//
analyzed: mngon sum ma yin bar thal ba'i phyir ro//
translated: because it follows that they are not perceived.

original: gzhan nyid yin na ni de dag mngon sum ma yin na /
analyzed: gzhan nyid yin na ni de dag mngon sum ma yin na /
translated: If they are different, then if they are not perceived,

original: yan lag can yang mngon sum ma yin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yan lag can yang mngon sum ma yin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: the part-possessor also would not be perceived.

original: yan lag mngon sum ma yin bar ni yan lag can mngon sum du 'gyur bar rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yan lag mngon sum ma yin bar ni yan lag can mngon sum du 'gyur bar rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not reasonable that the part-possessor is perceived when the parts are not perceived,

original: yan lag can dang po bzhin no //
analyzed: yan lag can dang po bzhin no //
translated: because it is like the part-possessor itself.

original: 'on te yan lag can rags pa mngon sum @198a * //
analyzed: 'on te yan lag can rags pa mngon sum @198a * //
translated: But if the gross part-possessor is perceived,

original: yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: but not the other parts,

original: gcig nyid ni rags par 'gal lo zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: gcig nyid ni rags par 'gal lo zhes bshad zin to //
translated: it is contradictory that it is gross, just as it is one.

original: des na yan lag gi tshogs tsam nyid yan lag can yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: des na yan lag gi tshogs tsam nyid yan lag can yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the mere collection of parts is the part-possessor, but not the other.

original: des na yan lag can ni med do zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: des na yan lag can ni med do zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: Therefore, it is established that the part-possessor does not exist.

original: de bzhin du rdzas ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdzas ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, substance does not exist.

original: zhes bya ba ni yon tan las gzhan pa zhes bya bar 'brel to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yon tan las gzhan pa zhes bya bar 'brel to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúfrom the qualities‚Äù is understood.

original: yon tan dang rdzas dag rdzas dang rdzas ma yin pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /üîΩyon tan rdzas nyid dam /
analyzed: yon tan dang rdzas dag rdzas dang rdzas ma yin pa nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni / yon tan rdzas nyid dam /
translated: Because it follows that the qualities and substance would be substance and non-substance.üîΩThe meaning of the phrase ‚Äúthe qualities would be substance‚Äù is

original: rdzas yon tan nyid du zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdzas yon tan nyid du zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: that substance would be the qualities.

original: 'di ltar tha dad pa yin na ni phan tshun ldog pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ltar tha dad pa yin na ni phan tshun ldog pa'i phyir /
translated: If they were different, they would be mutually exclusive.

original: rdzas yod pas gnas pa'i rang bzhin du gzung ba yin la yon tan rnams kyang de lta bu nyid yin no zhes rigs so //
analyzed: rdzas yod pas gnas pa'i rang bzhin du gzung ba yin la yon tan rnams kyang de lta bu nyid yin no zhes rigs so //
translated: It is reasonable to maintain that substance is apprehended as having the nature of endurance because it is a substance, and the qualities are also like that.

original: des na phan tshun spangs pas gnas pa gnyis po dag gcig ni yon tan la yin la gzhan ni rdzas yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba 'di ga las yin /
analyzed: des na phan tshun spangs pas gnas pa gnyis po dag gcig ni yon tan la yin la gzhan ni rdzas yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba 'di ga las yin /
translated: Therefore, how can there be this distinction, ‚ÄúOne of the two that endure through mutual exclusion is the qualities and the other is substance‚Äù?

original: phan tshun spangs pa ma yin na yang ga las rnam par dbye ba yod /
analyzed: phan tshun spangs pa ma yin na yang ga las rnam par dbye ba yod /
translated: If they are not mutually exclusive, how can there be a distinction?

original: 'on te yon tan la ni yon tan nyid la /
analyzed: 'on te yon tan la ni yon tan nyid la /
translated: If the qualities are the qualities of substance,

original: rdzas la ni rdzas nyid do zhes bya ba rnams par dbye ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rdzas la ni rdzas nyid do zhes bya ba rnams par dbye ba yin no zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúSubstance‚Äù is the differentiation of substance.

original: de yang 'thad pa ma yin te /üîΩrang gi rang bzhin las gzhan pa'i //
analyzed: de yang 'thad pa ma yin te / rang gi rang bzhin las gzhan pa'i //
translated: But that is not tenable.üîΩBecause qualities, etc.

original: yon tan nyid sogs yod ma yin //
analyzed: yon tan nyid sogs yod ma yin //
translated: do not exist separately from their own intrinsic nature.

original: yon tan nyid ni gzhan yin na //
analyzed: yon tan nyid ni gzhan yin na //
translated: If ‚Äúquality‚Äù itself were different,

original: der yang yod nyid yod par 'gyur //
analyzed: der yang yod nyid yod par 'gyur //
translated: then existence would exist there.

original: des na rdzas dang khyad med pa //
analyzed: des na rdzas dang khyad med pa //
translated: Therefore, the consequence that it is no different from substance

original: thal ba snga ma bzlog pa med //
analyzed: thal ba snga ma bzlog pa med //
translated: cannot be averted.üîΩIf existence exists, then everything that is different

original: yod nyid yod na tha dad dang // gzhan pa thams cad rdzas su 'gyur //
analyzed: yod nyid yod na tha dad dang // gzhan pa thams cad rdzas su 'gyur //
translated: would be a substance.

original: phan tshun spangs pas gnas pa nyid yin na //
analyzed: phan tshun spangs pas gnas pa nyid yin na //
translated: If they exist in mutual exclusion,üîΩthen the differentiation of substance and the other would not exist.

original: rdzas dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di gnas so //üîΩtha dad pa la ni rdzas nyid dang ldan pas ni rdzas la /
analyzed: rdzas dang cig shos kyi rnam par dbye ba med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di gnas so // tha dad pa la ni rdzas nyid dang ldan pas ni rdzas la /
translated: This is the point.

original: yon tan nyid dang ldan pas ni yon tan no zhes tha dad par 'dogs par 'gyur na de yang yang dag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yon tan nyid dang ldan pas ni yon tan no zhes tha dad par 'dogs par 'gyur na de yang yang dag pa ma yin te /
translated: If they were different, then substance would be designated as having substance and quality would be designated as having quality. But that is not correct.

original: phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i gzugs dang ro dag bzhin pas rdzas dang cig shos su 'gyur re skan /
analyzed: phan tshun spangs te gnas pa'i gzugs dang ro dag bzhin pas rdzas dang cig shos su 'gyur re skan /
translated: like form and taste, which are mutually exclusive.

original: yon tan nyid la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhe na ;
analyzed: yon tan nyid la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhe na ;
translated: If you say that substance is the possessor of quality, etc.,

original: ma yin te yon tan gyi gsal bas gsal bar bya bas yon tan nyid yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin te yon tan gyi gsal bas gsal bar bya bas yon tan nyid yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: no, because the manifestation of the substance is the quality, not anything else.

original: yon tan nyid dang rdzas nyid ni mtshungs pa'i rnam pa tsam yin no //
analyzed: yon tan nyid dang rdzas nyid ni mtshungs pa'i rnam pa tsam yin no //
translated: The substance and the quality are merely similar in appearance.üîΩThe difference between them is that the substance is the manifestation of a particular type of quality, and the quality is the manifestation of a particular type of substance.üîΩIf you say that the types themselves are mutually different,

original: de'i khyad par ni de dang rigs mi mthun pa'i gsal bas gsal ba nyid ces bya ba yin la gsal ba rigs mi @198b mthun pa yang rigs mi mthun pa gnas pa nyid kyis yin pa'i phyir phan tshun rten pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i khyad par ni de dang rigs mi mthun pa'i gsal bas gsal ba nyid ces bya ba yin la gsal ba rigs mi @198b mthun pa yang rigs mi mthun pa gnas pa nyid kyis yin pa'i phyir phan tshun rten pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: then the cause of the difference is the presence of a different type.

original: 'on te rigs rnams ni rang nyid kho nas phan tshun mi 'dra ba nyid do zhes brjod na /
analyzed: 'on te rigs rnams ni rang nyid kho nas phan tshun mi 'dra ba nyid do zhes brjod na /
translated: If you say that the types are mutually different by themselves,

original: de la yang mi mthun pa gnas pa nyid ldog pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de la yang mi mthun pa gnas pa nyid ldog pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: then the cause of the difference is the presence of a different type.

original: rang gi ngo bos ldog pa nyid yin na ni /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos ldog pa nyid yin na ni /
translated: If they were essentially different,

original: gsal ba rnams kyang de ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir rigs gzhan don med do //üîΩgal te yon tan zhes rnam pa mtshungs pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir yon tan nyid la sogs pa ni yon tan nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gsal ba rnams kyang de ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir rigs gzhan don med do // gal te yon tan zhes rnam pa mtshungs pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir yon tan nyid la sogs pa ni yon tan nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: then the manifestations would be the same, and it would be pointless to posit other types.üîΩIf you say that the reason is the same because the quality itself, etc.

original: de ni bar ma do'i sha lhag pa'i spyis ci bya ste /
analyzed: de ni bar ma do'i sha lhag pa'i spyis ci bya ste /
translated: are the reason for the similarity called ‚Äúquality,‚Äù then what is the point of the extra flesh of the middle term?

original: rang gi dgos pa spyi'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan ni so sor nges pa nyid kyis 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi dgos pa spyi'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan ni so sor nges pa nyid kyis 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the reason for the understanding that has the general form of its own purpose is established by the individual.

original: de ltar yin na rdzas dang rdzas ma yin pa dag rang gi ngo bos ni khyad par 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yin na rdzas dang rdzas ma yin pa dag rang gi ngo bos ni khyad par 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: If that were so, then substance and non-substance would not have any difference in their own nature.

original: des na rdzas yod na rdzas dang rdzas ma yin pa dag khyad par med pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na rdzas yod na rdzas dang rdzas ma yin pa dag khyad par med pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, if substance exists, it is not reasonable to say that substance and non-substance are not different.

original: med na ni khyad par yod do zhes bya bar mi rigs te ;
analyzed: med na ni khyad par yod do zhes bya bar mi rigs te ;
translated: If it does not exist, then it is not reasonable to say that they are different.

original: rdzas ni kun rdzob tu yod pa yin la /
analyzed: rdzas ni kun rdzob tu yod pa yin la /
translated: Substance exists conventionally.

original: yon tan ni de las sam gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan ni de las sam gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the quality is either the same as or different from that.

original: rang gi ngo bo dang khyad par gnyi ga gsal ba'i sgo nas dper brjod pa ni /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo dang khyad par gnyi ga gsal ba'i sgo nas dper brjod pa ni /
translated: An example of the statement of both the nature and the distinction is

original: 'di lta ste ngag thams cad ni bden pa'i don ma yin no zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di lta ste ngag thams cad ni bden pa'i don ma yin no zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: as follows: ‚ÄúFor example, all speech is not the meaning of truth.‚Äù

original: tshig kun bden pa'i don min zhes //
analyzed: tshig kun bden pa'i don min zhes //
translated: All speech is not the meaning of truth.

original: ngag dang bden min pa nyid kyi //
analyzed: ngag dang bden min pa nyid kyi //
translated: The statement of the meaning of the non-truth of speechüîΩis the fault of the desire to state the elimination of both

original: de yi ngo bo khyad par dag / spong ba brjod 'dod la skyon yin //
analyzed: de yi ngo bo khyad par dag / spong ba brjod 'dod la skyon yin //
translated: the nature and the distinction.

original: gang gi tshe ngag nyid mi bden pa nyid spyir bzlog par 'dod pa'i tshe gnyi ga'i rang bzhin 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ngag nyid mi bden pa nyid spyir bzlog par 'dod pa'i tshe gnyi ga'i rang bzhin 'gal ba yin no //
translated: When one desires to generally eliminate speech itself as not being the truth, then there is a contradiction in the nature of both.

original: gang gi tshe chos can dag gi chos rtag pa nyid dam mi bden pa nyid brjod bya mi bden pa yin pa de'i tshe ni gnyi ga'i khyad par gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe chos can dag gi chos rtag pa nyid dam mi bden pa nyid brjod bya mi bden pa yin pa de'i tshe ni gnyi ga'i khyad par gsal ba yin te /
translated: When the quality of the subjects, permanence or the non-truth, is the meaning of the statement, then both the nature and the distinction are stated,

original: ngag thams cad kyi khyad par dang brjod par bya ba mi bden pa nyid gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngag thams cad kyi khyad par dang brjod par bya ba mi bden pa nyid gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the distinction of all speech and the meaning of the statement, the non-truth, are stated.

original: brjod pa'i shugs kyis smra ba po tshad mar gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: brjod pa'i shugs kyis smra ba po tshad mar gyur pa yin te /
translated: The speaker is a valid person by the force of his statement.

original: de'i phyir des ni ngag nyid dang mi bden pa'i brjod par bya ba nyid gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir des ni ngag nyid dang mi bden pa'i brjod par bya ba nyid gsal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, he makes clear both his speech and the falsity of the object of his statement.

original: chos can gyi khyad par yang 'dir mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa 'ga' zhig yin par lta'o //
analyzed: chos can gyi khyad par yang 'dir mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa 'ga' zhig yin par lta'o //
translated: We also see that the specific property of the subject is something like impermanence.

original: gal te mi rtag pa nyid du grub pa ma yin na ni smra ba po tshad mar khas len pa dgos pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa nyid du grub pa ma yin na ni smra ba po tshad mar khas len pa dgos pa med pa nyid do //
translated: If impermanence were not established, then there would be no need to accept the speaker as a valid person.

original: gal te rtag pa nyid yin par gyur na smra ba pos 'ga' yang byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir smra ba po dag med pa nyid du @199a * //
analyzed: gal te rtag pa nyid yin par gyur na smra ba pos 'ga' yang byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir smra ba po dag med pa nyid du @199a * //
translated: If it were permanent, then because the speaker would not do anything, the speaker would be nonexistent.

original: 'gyur ro // des na 'di ni rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'gyur ro // des na 'di ni rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is a contradiction of your own words.

original: gal te ngag ni rtag gyur na //
analyzed: gal te ngag ni rtag gyur na //
translated: If speech were permanent,

original: smra ba po ni don med par //
analyzed: smra ba po ni don med par //
translated: then the speaker would be pointless.

original: ngag gi rang bzhin sgrub med na //
analyzed: ngag gi rang bzhin sgrub med na //
translated: If the nature of speech were not established,

original: grub pa nye bar 'jog par 'gyur //
analyzed: grub pa nye bar 'jog par 'gyur //
translated: then the established would be posited as nonexistent.

original: ngag gi rang bzhin sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i smra ba po ni ngag la phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: ngag gi rang bzhin sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i smra ba po ni ngag la phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: The speaker who does not perform the nature of speech does not benefit speech.üîΩThe one who does not benefit what is not speech does not benefit speech, because he does nothing to it.

original: der gyur pa ma yin pa'i phan par byed pa ni de la ci yang byas pa'i phyir phan par byed pa ma yin pa'i smra ba po ni ngag gis ltos par bya ba ma yin no //üîΩltos par bya ba yang yin te /
analyzed: der gyur pa ma yin pa'i phan par byed pa ni de la ci yang byas pa'i phyir phan par byed pa ma yin pa'i smra ba po ni ngag gis ltos par bya ba ma yin no // ltos par bya ba yang yin te /
translated: The speaker who does not depend on speech is not to be depended on.

original: des na mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: And he is not to be depended on, because he does not establish impermanence.

original: des na de'i khyad par gsal ba'i sgo nas 'di phyogs ltar snang ba yin no zhes gnas so //
analyzed: des na de'i khyad par gsal ba'i sgo nas 'di phyogs ltar snang ba yin no zhes gnas so //
translated: Therefore, this is a semblance of a reason, because of the specification of that.

original: de la rnam 'grel mdzad pas ni dper brjod pa'i phyogs tsam zhig bstan te /
analyzed: de la rnam 'grel mdzad pas ni dper brjod pa'i phyogs tsam zhig bstan te /
translated: In that regard, the author of the PramaÃÑnÔ¨Å ava just indicates an example of a reason,

original: phyogs 'dis dper brjod par bshad pa lhag ma rtogs pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: phyogs 'dis dper brjod par bshad pa lhag ma rtogs pa'i don du'o //
translated: in order to understand the rest of the explanation of the example by this method.

original: yan lag can gzhan nyid tsam bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: yan lag can gzhan nyid tsam bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not the case that the mere difference of the whole is to be established.

original: 'on kyang bya ba dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa 'du ba can gyi rgyu ni rdzas yin no zhes bya ba'i rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin du mthong ba la brtan pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang bya ba dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa 'du ba can gyi rgyu ni rdzas yin no zhes bya ba'i rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin du mthong ba la brtan pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: And in the same way, it is to be established that it is the substratum of seeing.

original: gal te yan lag can gzhan nyid tsam du bsgrub pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te yan lag can gzhan nyid tsam du bsgrub pa yin na /
translated: If the mere difference of the whole is to be established,

original: de'i tshe kun rdzob kyi bden pa tsam du de grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe kun rdzob kyi bden pa tsam du de grub pa yin no //
translated: then it is established as mere superficial reality.

original: yan lag ni don dam par yod pa yan lag can ni kun rdzob tu yod pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan nyid tsam bsgrub par bya ba yin na grub pa la sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: yan lag ni don dam par yod pa yan lag can ni kun rdzob tu yod pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan nyid tsam bsgrub par bya ba yin na grub pa la sgrub pa yin no //
translated: For the parts exist ultimately, and the whole exists superficially. So if the mere difference is to be established, it is the establishment of what is already established.

original: bltar mi rung ba med pa'i 'bras //
analyzed: bltar mi rung ba med pa'i 'bras //
translated: The effect is not visible,

original: mthong nas yan lag can 'dod do /
analyzed: mthong nas yan lag can 'dod do /
translated: but the whole is accepted when it is seen.

original: khyad par can min gzhan yod ni ;
analyzed: khyad par can min gzhan yod ni ;
translated: If the difference is not special,

original: / grub na grub pa sgrub pa nyid //
analyzed: / grub na grub pa sgrub pa nyid //
translated: then the establishment of what is already established.

original: rdul phra rab la sogs pa'i yan lag las tha dad pa tsam du ni blo 'khrul pa'i rnam pa'i rnam pa grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: rdul phra rab la sogs pa'i yan lag las tha dad pa tsam du ni blo 'khrul pa'i rnam pa'i rnam pa grub pa nyid do //
translated: It is established that the form of the cognition is merely different from the parts, such as the atoms, etc.

original: de nyid grub na ni nges par grub pa la bsgrub par bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid grub na ni nges par grub pa la bsgrub par bya ba nyid do //
translated: If that is established, then the establishment of the whole is established.

original: ha cang ring po na gnas pa ma yin pa phan tshun nye ba nyid du gnas shing ma 'dres pa'i sgra'i yul dag la sems gcig gi rnam par snang ba'i rtogs pa ni mthong ba nyid do //
analyzed: ha cang ring po na gnas pa ma yin pa phan tshun nye ba nyid du gnas shing ma 'dres pa'i sgra'i yul dag la sems gcig gi rnam par snang ba'i rtogs pa ni mthong ba nyid do //
translated: The cognition that appears in the form of a single mind with regard to the objects of sound, which are located not too far away, are located in mutual proximity, and are not mixed, is seen.

original: des na de tsam gyis ni rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa las tha dad pa'i yan lag can mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: des na de tsam gyis ni rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa las tha dad pa'i yan lag can mi 'grub bo //
translated: Therefore, the whole is not established as different from the form of consciousness by that alone.

original: des na der rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des na der rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the possession of the characteristic of substance should be established there.

original: de la yang yon tan rtsi ba nyid @199b dang ; bya ba thur du 'gro ba nyid dang / de dag gi 'du ba can gyi rgyu yin pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan na rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa las tha dad par 'grub po //
analyzed: de la yang yon tan rtsi ba nyid @199b dang ; bya ba thur du 'gro ba nyid dang / de dag gi 'du ba can gyi rgyu yin pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan na rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa las tha dad par 'grub po //
translated: And it is established as a different aspect from consciousness if it has the characteristics of being heavy, of moving downward, and of being the cause of the collection of those.üîΩIf that is so,

original: de ltar yin dang / gal te 'di lci 'og 'gro 'gyur //üîΩsrang ni dma' bdag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: de ltar yin dang / gal te 'di lci 'og 'gro 'gyur // srang ni dma' bdag tu 'gyur //
translated: then the scale‚Äôs arm would move down.

original: lci ba nyid kyis rab tu sbyar ba'i 'og tu 'gro ba yod na /
analyzed: lci ba nyid kyis rab tu sbyar ba'i 'og tu 'gro ba yod na /
translated: If there is movement downward due to heaviness,

original: gdon mi za bar des dran pas na srang mgo yang dma' bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: gdon mi za bar des dran pas na srang mgo yang dma' bar 'gyur na /
translated: then the scale‚Äôs arm would move down because it is remembered by that.

original: yan lag can rtogs par byed pa de ni yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: yan lag can rtogs par byed pa de ni yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: But that which causes the apprehension of the whole does not exist.

original: des na 'di rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: des na 'di rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: Therefore, it is explained that it does not have the characteristics of a substance:

original: des na yon tan bya med pa //
analyzed: des na yon tan bya med pa //
translated: Therefore it has no qualities and no activity.

original: de phyir 'du ba can rgyu min //
analyzed: de phyir 'du ba can rgyu min //
translated: Therefore it is not the cause of the collection.

original: 'di yon tan dang las gang dag gi 'du ba can gyi rgyu ba yin pa de med na de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes mjug bsdu ba'o //üîΩde phyir 'bras bu ngo bo dag / mthong ba med phyir de mthong min //
analyzed: 'di yon tan dang las gang dag gi 'du ba can gyi rgyu ba yin pa de med na de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes mjug bsdu ba'o // de phyir 'bras bu ngo bo dag / mthong ba med phyir de mthong min //
translated: This is the conclusion: ‚ÄúIf the collection of qualities and actions were the cause of the goer, then the goer would not exist if that were absent.‚ÄùüîΩTherefore, since the essence of the effect is not seen, it is not seen.

original: de la ni bltar rung ba nyid kyang med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de la ni bltar rung ba nyid kyang med pa nyid do //
translated: Here, the essence of the effect is not seen, and it is not even possible to see it.

original: des ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: des ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: This is twofold:

original: nye bar btags pa las dang / dngos po re zhig nye bar btags pas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: nye bar btags pa las dang / dngos po re zhig nye bar btags pas ni ma yin te /
translated: The effect is not imputed in the sense of an entity, nor is it imputed in the sense of something else.

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu lci ba la sogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu lci ba la sogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the effect is heavy, etc.

original: nye bar btags pa las cig shos kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: nye bar btags pa las cig shos kyang ma yin te /
translated: The effect is not imputed in the sense of something else.

original: yan lag can gyi rang bzhin tha dad par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yan lag can gyi rang bzhin tha dad par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the nature of the whole is seen to be different.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa rags pa nyid du dmigs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa rags pa nyid du dmigs pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the aspect of consciousness is observed to be gross.

original: de las 'phags pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las 'phags pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the noble ones are not seen in that.

original: des na med na mi 'byung ba //
analyzed: des na med na mi 'byung ba //
translated: Therefore, the absence of the effect is not the cause of the destruction of the entity.

original: gzhan gyi khyad par gnod pa yin //
analyzed: gzhan gyi khyad par gnod pa yin //
translated: The difference of the other is harmed.

original: smras pa gzhan tsam la ltos te //
analyzed: smras pa gzhan tsam la ltos te //
translated: Reply: In relation to something else.

original: rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas ni gzhan gyi khyad par yin no //
analyzed: rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas ni gzhan gyi khyad par yin no //
translated: But it is a specific property of something else, in virtue of having the characteristic of substance.

original: de yang med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: And that is not to be established by the non-existence of that,

original: de ltar ma yin na gzhan tsam ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na gzhan tsam ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because if it were not so, then something else would not be the object to be established.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / lci ba nyid dang 'og 'gro ba //
analyzed: 'di ltar / lci ba nyid dang 'og 'gro ba //
translated: If heaviness and downward movement are rejected,

original: spangs na snang ba tsam du 'gyur //üîΩsnang ba tsam nyid rnam shes las //
analyzed: spangs na snang ba tsam du 'gyur // snang ba tsam nyid rnam shes las //
translated: then there is only appearance.üîΩAnd it is difficult to maintain that mere appearance

original: tha dad par ni 'thad par dka' //
analyzed: tha dad par ni 'thad par dka' //
translated: is different from consciousness.

original: rab rib kyis mthong ba'i nus pa phyin ci log tu byas pa'i mig can rnams la yang /
analyzed: rab rib kyis mthong ba'i nus pa phyin ci log tu byas pa'i mig can rnams la yang /
translated: Even for those whose eyes are affected by ophthalmia,

original: skra dang sha sbrang dang sbrang bu la sogs pa /
analyzed: skra dang sha sbrang dang sbrang bu la sogs pa /
translated: hairs, bees, flies, and so forth,

original: med par mos pa'i phyogs su gnas pa dag mngon sum du snang ba yin te /
analyzed: med par mos pa'i phyogs su gnas pa dag mngon sum du snang ba yin te /
translated: which do not exist, appear directly to those who are situated in a place where they believe them to exist.

original: de dag de ltar snang ba nyid kyis ni med par mi 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag de ltar snang ba nyid kyis ni med par mi 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that they do not exist because they appear in that way.

original: 'dir / phra mo nas brtsams rdzas phreng dag / bcal nyid phyir na rdzas gzhan gyi //üîΩlci nyid mi rtogs @200a * //
analyzed: 'dir / phra mo nas brtsams rdzas phreng dag / bcal nyid phyir na rdzas gzhan gyi // lci nyid mi rtogs @200a * //
translated: because the series of substances beginning with the subtle are weighed,

original: ras bal gyi //
analyzed: ras bal gyi //
translated: the weight of the other substances is not perceived.

original: 'dab gzhag bzhin zhes gzhan dag zer //
analyzed: 'dab gzhag bzhin zhes gzhan dag zer //
translated: Others say it is like a cotton ball.

original: phra mo rdul gnyis pa la sogs pa'i rdzas kyi phreng ba dag gzhal ba'i tshad dang 'brel pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phra mo rdul gnyis pa la sogs pa'i rdzas kyi phreng ba dag gzhal ba'i tshad dang 'brel pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the series of substances beginning with the subtle are related to the measure of weighing,

original: rdzas du ma'i nang na gnas pa'i rdzas gzhan gyi lcid mtshon par mi nus pa'i phyir srang mda' dma' ba mi 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: rdzas du ma'i nang na gnas pa'i rdzas gzhan gyi lcid mtshon par mi nus pa'i phyir srang mda' dma' ba mi 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: the weight of the other substances that exist among many substances cannot be indicated, so the scale does not hold low.

original: 'di ltar kha ba'i gong bu gnyis sbyar ba na /
analyzed: 'di ltar kha ba'i gong bu gnyis sbyar ba na /
translated: Thus, when two balls of snow are joined,

original: gal te yon tan dang bya ba dang ldan pa'i rdzas gzhan skye ba yin pa de lta na yang rdul gnyis pa la sogs pa'i rdzas kyi phreng ba yang de na yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: gal te yon tan dang bya ba dang ldan pa'i rdzas gzhan skye ba yin pa de lta na yang rdul gnyis pa la sogs pa'i rdzas kyi phreng ba yang de na yod pa nyid do //
translated: even if a substance endowed with qualities and actions arises, the series of substances beginning with the second particle exists there.

original: des na lcid dang ldan pa du ma'i nang na gnas pa de'i lcid mi tshor ba yin te ;
analyzed: des na lcid dang ldan pa du ma'i nang na gnas pa de'i lcid mi tshor ba yin te ;
translated: Therefore, the weight of that which exists among many that possess weight is not felt.

original: ras bal gyi khur gyi nad du gzhag pa'i ras bal gyi 'da'i ba'i lci ba nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: ras bal gyi khur gyi nad du gzhag pa'i ras bal gyi 'da'i ba'i lci ba nyid bzhin no //
translated: It is like the heaviness of cotton in the state of a bale of cotton.

original: ma rtogs kyang de'i lci ba nyid dang thur du 'gro ba nyid med pa nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ma rtogs kyang de'i lci ba nyid dang thur du 'gro ba nyid med pa nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: But even if it is not understood, it is not that there is no heaviness or downward movement in it.

original: des na de yon tan dang byed pa med pa de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs de ma grub po zhe na /
analyzed: des na de yon tan dang byed pa med pa de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs de ma grub po zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the reason ‚Äúbecause it is without qualities and activity‚Äù is unestablished.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.üîΩBecause it is like this:

original: 'di ltar ; gal te lci nyid mi rtogs na //
analyzed: 'di ltar ; gal te lci nyid mi rtogs na //
translated: If heaviness is not understood,

original: blo lhag de ni ga la rtogs //
analyzed: blo lhag de ni ga la rtogs //
translated: how is the excess of the mind understood?

original: de rig 'di nyid la re bam //
analyzed: de rig 'di nyid la re bam //
translated: If it is hoped that this very thing is known,

original: de log na ni ci ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: de log na ni ci ltar 'gyur //
translated: what will happen when it is stopped?

original: lci ba nyid dang 'og tu 'gro ba nyid med na ni snang ba tsam du grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lci ba nyid dang 'og tu 'gro ba nyid med na ni snang ba tsam du grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: If there is no heaviness or downward movement, mere appearance is established.

original: de bsgrub pas ni bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de bsgrub pas ni bsgrub par bya ba 'grub pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: It is not established by establishing that.üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang // de ltar sa rdul tshogs dag la //
analyzed: gzhan yang // de ltar sa rdul tshogs dag la //
translated: in that way, in the collection of earth particles,üîΩthe simultaneous possession of thatüîΩand the individual possession of the collection of particles

original: de yi cig car ldan pa dang // so sor ldan pa'i rdul tshogs dag / so sor lhan cig bcal ba na //
analyzed: de yi cig car ldan pa dang // so sor ldan pa'i rdul tshogs dag / so sor lhan cig bcal ba na //
translated: are individually added together.

original: de phyir lcid ni tha dad 'gyur //üîΩrim gyis ldan pa'i rdul gyi tshogs la ni lci ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yan lag can du ma yod pa las 'gyur pa'i lcid chen po dang ldan pa yin pa cig car dang ldan pa la ni /
analyzed: de phyir lcid ni tha dad 'gyur // rim gyis ldan pa'i rdul gyi tshogs la ni lci ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yan lag can du ma yod pa las 'gyur pa'i lcid chen po dang ldan pa yin pa cig car dang ldan pa la ni /
translated: Therefore, there is a difference in weight.üîΩA collection of atoms that are gradually combined has many parts that possess weight, and therefore it has great weight.

original: yan lag can gcig nyid du zad pa'i phyir lcid chen po nyid med de /
analyzed: yan lag can gcig nyid du zad pa'i phyir lcid chen po nyid med de /
translated: But in the case of simultaneous combination, there is only one part, and therefore there is no great weight.

original: des na tha dad par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na tha dad par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, it follows that there would be a difference.

original: tha dad par ni dmigs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad par ni dmigs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: But there is no difference in the way they are perceived.

original: ras bal gyi 'dab ma du ma'i tshogs gzhan na ni rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: ras bal gyi 'dab ma du ma'i tshogs gzhan na ni rtogs pa yin te /
translated: In the case of a collection of many cotton balls, there is a difference in the way they are perceived.

original: des na 'di ni dpe ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di ni dpe ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is not a good example.

original: 'on te sngar yan lag can thams cad zhig pa na mthar yan lag can gcig nyid gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on te sngar yan lag can thams cad zhig pa na mthar yan lag can gcig nyid gnas pa yin te /
translated: But if you say that when all the parts are destroyed, finally only one part remains,

original: des na yan lag can du ma med pas na /
analyzed: des na yan lag can du ma med pas na /
translated: then because there is no longer a whole,

original: cig car ldan pa'i sa rdul gyi tshogs dag lcid mtshungs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir skyon med do zhe na /
analyzed: cig car ldan pa'i sa rdul gyi tshogs dag lcid mtshungs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir skyon med do zhe na /
translated: the weight of the collection of atoms that are simultaneously combined is the same, and therefore there is no error.

original: de ltar na @200b rdzas phreng gzhal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba mi 'thad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na @200b rdzas phreng gzhal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba mi 'thad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, it is not tenable to say, ‚ÄúBecause the mass of atoms is cognized.‚Äù

original: tha ma'i lci ba nyid mi rtogs pa yang mi 'thad do //
analyzed: tha ma'i lci ba nyid mi rtogs pa yang mi 'thad do //
translated: And it is not tenable that the heaviness of the last atom is not cognized.

original: 'on te rtsom par byed pa'i yan lag so sor gyur pa dag gi lcid ci tsam yin pa des brtsams pa'i yan lag can yang de tsam nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on te rtsom par byed pa'i yan lag so sor gyur pa dag gi lcid ci tsam yin pa des brtsams pa'i yan lag can yang de tsam nyid yin no //
translated: But if the heaviness of the parts that are the beginning of the composition is the same as the heaviness of the whole that is the end of the composition,

original: des na srang ma da'i khyad par du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: des na srang ma da'i khyad par du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then the difference between the scale‚Äôs balance and imbalance would not occur.

original: de ltar na 'on yan lag thams cad zhig na yan lag can skye ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar na 'on yan lag thams cad zhig na yan lag can skye ba'i phyir /
translated: In that case, because the whole would arise when all the parts are destroyed,

original: rdul phra rab rnams kyang 'jig pas rdul phra rab brtags pa yin no zhes bya ba'i grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal lo //
analyzed: rdul phra rab rnams kyang 'jig pas rdul phra rab brtags pa yin no zhes bya ba'i grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal lo //
translated: the theory of the atom is contradicted by the theory that the atom is destroyed.

original: 'on te rnam par dbye bas 'jig pa yin na rdul phra rab dag la ni rnam par dbye ba srid pa ma yin te cha med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rnam par dbye bas 'jig pa yin na rdul phra rab dag la ni rnam par dbye ba srid pa ma yin te cha med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: But if it is destroyed by separation, then separation is not possible for atoms because they have no parts.

original: ma yin te cha med par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te cha med par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because it is not logical that they are partless.

original: lus can dag ni gdon mi za bar pha rol dang tshu rol gyi yul gyi rnam par dbye ba ldan par 'gyur dgos so //
analyzed: lus can dag ni gdon mi za bar pha rol dang tshu rol gyi yul gyi rnam par dbye ba ldan par 'gyur dgos so //
translated: It is certain that embodied beings are endowed with a distinction between the prior and posterior parts of their bodies.

original: de'i phyir yan lag can 'jig pa zhes bya bar mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir yan lag can 'jig pa zhes bya bar mi 'thad do //
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable to say that the whole is destroyed.

original: 'on te yang rdul phra rab rnams kyang 'jig mod nged la chad pa ci yod ce na /
analyzed: 'on te yang rdul phra rab rnams kyang 'jig mod nged la chad pa ci yod ce na /
translated: But if the atoms are destroyed, what is the problem for us?

original: de ltar na 'o na /üîΩma sha la sogs rim pa yis //
analyzed: de ltar na 'o na / ma sha la sogs rim pa yis //
translated: In that case,

original: grangs mtshungs pa ni mi rung ngo //
analyzed: grangs mtshungs pa ni mi rung ngo //
translated: it is not tenable that the numberüîΩof the parts is the same.

original: ma sha'i gong bu rnams zhig pas yan lag can gcig nyid yin phyir ma sha lnga'i gang bur mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma sha'i gong bu rnams zhig pas yan lag can gcig nyid yin phyir ma sha lnga'i gang bur mi 'gyur te /
translated: Because the mass of flesh is destroyed, it is not the case that the number of the parts is the same as the number of the parts of the mass of flesh.

original: ma sha gcig nyid do zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma sha gcig nyid do zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It is said that there is only one mass of flesh.

original: lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i grangs ni lci ba du ma yod na 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i grangs ni lci ba du ma yod na 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The number ‚Äúfive‚Äù and so on is used because there are many heavy things.

original: gcig nyid yin na ni grangs gcig nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gcig nyid yin na ni grangs gcig nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: If there is only one, then there is only one number.

original: yan lag can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yan lag can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the whole.

original: 'on te lci ba nyid gcig yin yang de ltar tha snyad byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te lci ba nyid gcig yin yang de ltar tha snyad byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the weight is one, but the convention is made in that way,

original: de lta yin na grangs don dam par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na grangs don dam par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then the number is not ultimately real.

original: de'i phyir yan lag rnams yan lag can gyis 'jig na /
analyzed: de'i phyir yan lag rnams yan lag can gyis 'jig na /
translated: Therefore, if the parts are destroyed by the whole,

original: ma sha la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa'i rgyu mtshan de la brten pa'i grangs 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ma sha la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa'i rgyu mtshan de la brten pa'i grangs 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: the number based on that reason is not tenable, like the parts of a cow.

original: des na yan lag rnams rim gyis skye ba'i phyir du ma yod pas gdon mi za bar lcid khyad par yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na yan lag rnams rim gyis skye ba'i phyir du ma yod pas gdon mi za bar lcid khyad par yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, since the parts exist as many because they arise in sequence, they must have different weights.

original: 'on te yungs kar las sngon rol gyis gong ma thams cad ni mi rtogs pa yin te //
analyzed: 'on te yungs kar las sngon rol gyis gong ma thams cad ni mi rtogs pa yin te //
translated: But if you say that the weight of a mustard seed is not perceived before the weight of a mountain,

original: cig mi rtogs pa bzhin du thams cad kyang yin te /
analyzed: cig mi rtogs pa bzhin du thams cad kyang yin te /
translated: then just as the weight of one is not perceived, the weight of all is not perceived,

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because there is no difference.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: ras bal 'dab cig ma rtogs pas //
analyzed: ras bal 'dab cig ma rtogs pas //
translated: Because one part of cotton wool is not perceived,

original: 'dab bal de yi tshogs pa yang //
analyzed: 'dab bal de yi tshogs pa yang //
translated: the collection of that cotton wool

original: mi rtogs pa ni 'gyur ba min //
analyzed: mi rtogs pa ni 'gyur ba min //
translated: is not not perceived.

original: des na 'di @201a * //
analyzed: des na 'di @201a * //
translated: Therefore, this

original: ni 'byor ma yin //
analyzed: ni 'byor ma yin //
translated: is not tenable.

original: gcig ma rtogs pas de'i tshogs kyang mi rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig ma rtogs pas de'i tshogs kyang mi rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that one does not understand the collection because one does not understand one part of it.

original: 'dab bal gcig gi lcid ma rtogs kyang khur bu'i lcid rtogs pa'i phyir 'dab bal gyi tshogs pa nyid ras bal gyi khur bu'i tha snyad la brten pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dab bal gcig gi lcid ma rtogs kyang khur bu'i lcid rtogs pa'i phyir 'dab bal gyi tshogs pa nyid ras bal gyi khur bu'i tha snyad la brten pa yin no //
translated: Because one does not understand the weight of one cotton tuft, one does not understand the weight of a bundle of cotton. Therefore, the collection of cotton tufts is the basis of the convention ‚Äúbundle of cotton.‚Äù

original: gzhan yang / gal te yungs kar nas brtsams te /üîΩtshogs chen gong nas gong du ni //üîΩ'phel brtan 'bras bu'i phreng ba yi //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gal te yungs kar nas brtsams te / tshogs chen gong nas gong du ni // 'phel brtan 'bras bu'i phreng ba yi //
translated: Moreover,

original: lci ba rtogs pa ma yin na //
analyzed: lci ba rtogs pa ma yin na //
translated: If one does not understand the weightüîΩof the increasing collection

original: yungs kar bar gyi lci dag kyang //
analyzed: yungs kar bar gyi lci dag kyang //
translated: of mustard seeds,

original: chung ngu shin tu rtogs dka' bas //
analyzed: chung ngu shin tu rtogs dka' bas //
translated: beginning with one, up to a great heap,üîΩthen,

original: 'bras bu'i lcid ni mi rtogs phyir //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i lcid ni mi rtogs phyir //
translated: because one does not understand the weight of the fruit,

original: de yi rgyu nyid gzhal byar 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi rgyu nyid gzhal byar 'gyur //
translated: the cause of that would be an object of comprehension.

original: yungs kar ni 'ol ma si'i bzhi cha'o //
analyzed: yungs kar ni 'ol ma si'i bzhi cha'o //
translated: One mustard seed is one-fourth the size of a barley seed.

original: yungs kar de nas brtsams te tshogs chen po gong du 'phel ba'i 'bras bu'i rdzas kyi rgyu mtshan can gyi lcid mi rtogs na /
analyzed: yungs kar de nas brtsams te tshogs chen po gong du 'phel ba'i 'bras bu'i rdzas kyi rgyu mtshan can gyi lcid mi rtogs na /
translated: If one does not understand the weight of the collection of mustard seeds, beginning with one, up to a great heap, which is the cause of the substance of the fruit,

original: yungs kar las snga ma snga ma je chung ngu 'gyur ba dag shin tu yang cher mi rtogs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yungs kar las snga ma snga ma je chung ngu 'gyur ba dag shin tu yang cher mi rtogs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The earlier seeds are smaller than the later ones, and so they are not recognized as being very heavy.

original: des na 'bras bu'i phreng ba'i lcid mi rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na 'bras bu'i phreng ba'i lcid mi rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since the weight of the series of effects is not recognized,

original: 'os gzhan med pas de'i rgyu nyid gzhal bar bya ba yin no zhes bya bar shin tu gsal bar rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'os gzhan med pas de'i rgyu nyid gzhal bar bya ba yin no zhes bya bar shin tu gsal bar rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: it is not at all reasonable to infer that the cause of the weight is the object of evaluation.

original: lcid kyi khyad par dang ldan par rtogs pa nyid gzhal ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lcid kyi khyad par dang ldan par rtogs pa nyid gzhal ba yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: The weight of the object is recognized, but not anything else.

original: gong ma gong ma'i 'bras bu'i lcid mi rtogs na lcid de rgyu'i yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gong ma gong ma'i 'bras bu'i lcid mi rtogs na lcid de rgyu'i yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the weight of the effect is not recognized, then the weight of the cause would not be recognized.

original: de yang gzhal ba na de'i rgyu'i lcid yin la /
analyzed: de yang gzhal ba na de'i rgyu'i lcid yin la /
translated: If that is recognized, then the weight of the cause of that is recognized.

original: de'i yang de'i rgyu'i yin pa'i phyir rdul phra rab kyi bar gyi rgyu gzhal byar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i yang de'i rgyu'i yin pa'i phyir rdul phra rab kyi bar gyi rgyu gzhal byar 'gyur ro //
translated: And if that is recognized, then the weight of the cause of that is recognized. Thus, the cause of the atom would be the object of evaluation.

original: de dag la ni rgyu gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag la ni rgyu gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no other cause of weight.üîΩThus,üîΩIf the final part

original: 'di ltar / tha ma'i yan lag can zhig na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / tha ma'i yan lag can zhig na //
translated: is heavy,üîΩthen the other parts

original: de dag kyang ni lcid de nyid //
analyzed: de dag kyang ni lcid de nyid //
translated: are also heavy.

original: de dang zhig par gyur kyang ni //
analyzed: de dang zhig par gyur kyang ni //
translated: But even when it is destroyed,

original: phyis kyang lcid de nyid mthong ba //üîΩdes na rjes su dpag pa las //
analyzed: phyis kyang lcid de nyid mthong ba // des na rjes su dpag pa las //
translated: its weight is still seen later.üîΩTherefore, weight is understood

original: lcid nyid rngul bran dag la rtogs //
analyzed: lcid nyid rngul bran dag la rtogs //
translated: from inference, not from direct perception.

original: des na yan lag can rdzas ni //
analyzed: des na yan lag can rdzas ni //
translated: Therefore, the whole, substance,

original: rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan min //
analyzed: rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan min //
translated: does not possess the characteristics of substance.

original: gzhan yang 'dab bal gyi lcid nyid mi rtogs kyang yod pa nyid do /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dab bal gyi lcid nyid mi rtogs kyang yod pa nyid do /
translated: Moreover, the weight of the cloth is not understood, but it exists.

original: de bltar rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bltar rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is visible.

original: yan lag can ni mthong ba ma yin gyi 'on kyang de ni 'bras bu mthong ba nyid yod pas yod par rnam par gzhag par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yan lag can ni mthong ba ma yin gyi 'on kyang de ni 'bras bu mthong ba nyid yod pas yod par rnam par gzhag par bya ba yin no //
translated: The whole is not seen, but it is established as existing because its effect is seen.

original: de dag thams cad kyang rung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang rung ba ma yin te /
translated: But all of that is not correct.üîΩBecause:

original: 'di ltar / don de mthong med ras 'dab bzhin //
analyzed: 'di ltar / don de mthong med ras 'dab bzhin //
translated: The cloth is not seen,

original: de yi @201b 'bras bu 'ang rtogs pa med //
analyzed: de yi @201b 'bras bu 'ang rtogs pa med //
translated: nor is its effect understood.

original: lcid nyid rtogs med bzhin du de'i //
analyzed: lcid nyid rtogs med bzhin du de'i //
translated: Like the weight is not understood,

original: yon tan thams cad rtogs med phyir //
analyzed: yon tan thams cad rtogs med phyir //
translated: all its qualities are not understood.

original: ma sha la sogs lhag yod min //
analyzed: ma sha la sogs lhag yod min //
translated: The remaining parts, such as the threads,

original: dma' ba nye bar mtshon pa yin //
analyzed: dma' ba nye bar mtshon pa yin //
translated: are indicated as being low.

original: gzugs sogs lhag dang lhag ci bzhin //
analyzed: gzugs sogs lhag dang lhag ci bzhin //
translated: And the form, etc., that are more and more subtle,

original: rang gi dbang pos mthong med phyir //
analyzed: rang gi dbang pos mthong med phyir //
translated: are not seen by the eye sense faculty.

original: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gis ma rtogs pa ci ltar yod do zhes rtogs par bya /
analyzed: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gis ma rtogs pa ci ltar yod do zhes rtogs par bya /
translated: How can one understand that they exist, when they are not perceived by direct perception or inference?

original: gal te lci ba nyid ma rtogs kyang //
analyzed: gal te lci ba nyid ma rtogs kyang //
translated: If one does not perceive heaviness,

original: rnam pa gzhan gyis rtogs pa yang srid pa'i phyir ci ltar med pa nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan gyis rtogs pa yang srid pa'i phyir ci ltar med pa nyid yin zhe na /
translated: it is still possible to perceive it by another mode. How can it be nonexistent?

original: ma yin te gzugs la sogs pa gzhan yang rtogs pa med pa'i phyir na ma sha la sogs pa yan lag can rnams las lhag pa ni yod pa ma yin no /üîΩ// / bam po brgyad pa /
analyzed: ma yin te gzugs la sogs pa gzhan yang rtogs pa med pa'i phyir na ma sha la sogs pa yan lag can rnams las lhag pa ni yod pa ma yin no / // / bam po brgyad pa /
translated: No, because form, etc., are not perceived in any other mode. Therefore, the whole, such as cloth, does not exist apart from the parts, such as the threads.

original: 'o na ji ltar srang dma' ba'i khyad par mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes slob dpon gyis dngos por nges pa nyid brjod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar srang dma' ba'i khyad par mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes slob dpon gyis dngos por nges pa nyid brjod ce na /
translated: But why did the Master say that the whole is ascertained to exist, because the difference in the depression of the scale is not apprehended?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩüîΩ

original: nye bar mtshon pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar mtshon pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is an illustration.

original: dma' ba de 'ba' zhig brjod pa yin yang gzhan dag kyang ston par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dma' ba de 'ba' zhig brjod pa yin yang gzhan dag kyang ston par byed pa yin no //
translated: Even though only the depression is mentioned, the others are also indicated.

original: ci ltar thams cad mi rtogs pa zhes bya bar shes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar thams cad mi rtogs pa zhes bya bar shes par bya zhe na /
translated: How is it to be understood that ‚Äúall is not perceived‚Äù?

original: 'di la shes par bya ba ci zhig yod /
analyzed: 'di la shes par bya ba ci zhig yod /
translated: What is there to be understood here?

original: mig la sogs pas ci ltar ci lta ba bzhin gzugs la sogs pa'i lhag dang lhag pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mig la sogs pas ci ltar ci lta ba bzhin gzugs la sogs pa'i lhag dang lhag pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the eye, etc. do not perceive any entity that is more or less than form, etc.

original: yang lag can yod kyang gzugs dang ro la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams las lhag pa ni rtogs pa yod do //
analyzed: yang lag can yod kyang gzugs dang ro la sogs pa'i yan lag rnams las lhag pa ni rtogs pa yod do //
translated: But the possessor of parts, the whole, does exist, and it is perceived as something more than the parts, form, taste, etc.

original: de'i yon tan dang las dang ldan pa bltar rung ba'i yan lag can med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i yon tan dang las dang ldan pa bltar rung ba'i yan lag can med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the whole, which possesses the qualities and actions of the parts, is not visible.

original: chos kyi khyad par gnod pa'i sgo nas phyogs kyi skyon yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi khyad par gnod pa'i sgo nas phyogs kyi skyon yin no //
translated: The fault of the position is shown by the contradiction of a particular quality.

original: phyogs 'di yang khas blangs pa dag /üîΩrang gi tshig dang rjes su dpag pa dang / grags pas gnod pa yin no //
analyzed: phyogs 'di yang khas blangs pa dag / rang gi tshig dang rjes su dpag pa dang / grags pas gnod pa yin no //
translated: And this position is contradicted by what is accepted,üîΩby one‚Äôs own words, by inference, and by common sense.üîΩThe fault of contradicting what is accepted

original: khas blangs rang gi tshig sogs kyi //
analyzed: khas blangs rang gi tshig sogs kyi //
translated: is the most important.

original: gnod pa dag ni srid pas na //
analyzed: gnod pa dag ni srid pas na //
translated: Because it is possible to contradict

original: ci skad bshad pa'i phyogs kyis ni //
analyzed: ci skad bshad pa'i phyogs kyis ni //
translated: what is accepted, one‚Äôs own words, etc.üîΩThe position as it has been explained

original: dper brjod gzhan yang rtogs bya ba //
analyzed: dper brjod gzhan yang rtogs bya ba //
translated: Other examples should be understood in the same way.

original: rang gi ngo bo gnod pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo gnod pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the nature of something that is being harmed.

original: yang lag can gyi gnod par byed pa'i rigs pas bstan pa ni 'di las gzhan slob dpon gyis gsungs pa'i dper brjod pa dag kyang rtogs par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yang lag can gyi gnod par byed pa'i rigs pas bstan pa ni 'di las gzhan slob dpon gyis gsungs pa'i dper brjod pa dag kyang rtogs par bya ba yin no //
translated: The master has stated other examples that should be understood in the same way as the example of the harm caused by the man with the stick.

original: de yang sngar bstan pa nyid do //
analyzed: de yang sngar bstan pa nyid do //
translated: And those have already been explained.

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa'i phyogs de dam bca' ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs pa can rnams kyi phyogs kyi @202a * //
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa'i phyogs de dam bca' ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs pa can rnams kyi phyogs kyi @202a * //
translated: If the thesis is the position that is being proven, then the thesis would be the reason and example, because they are positions that are being proven.

original: yin te ; 'di las skyon ci yod ce na /
analyzed: yin te ; 'di las skyon ci yod ce na /
translated: What is the fault of that?

original: ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe dag kyang der thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe dag kyang der thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It follows that the reason and example would not be established.

original: gal te bsgrub par bya bar gyur pa'i phyir bsgrub bya ba yin nam /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya bar gyur pa'i phyir bsgrub bya ba yin nam /
translated: If you say that the thesis is that which is being proven,

original: ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe dag ni sgrub par bya bar 'gyur ba yin pas na /
analyzed: ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe dag ni sgrub par bya bar 'gyur ba yin pas na /
translated: then the reason and example would be that which is being proven,

original: de ci ltar de gnyis dam bca' bar thal zhe na /
analyzed: de ci ltar de gnyis dam bca' bar thal zhe na /
translated: so how could it be that those two are the thesis?

original: gal te da ltar bsgrub par bya bstan pa zhes bya bar 'grub na /
analyzed: gal te da ltar bsgrub par bya bstan pa zhes bya bar 'grub na /
translated: If it is established that the object to be established is present in the present,

original: de bden pa zhig na /
analyzed: de bden pa zhig na /
translated: then that is true.

original: bya ba dus gsum yul can phyir //
analyzed: bya ba dus gsum yul can phyir //
translated: Because the object of the action is in the three times,

original: de lta'i bdag nyid gzhan dag la //
analyzed: de lta'i bdag nyid gzhan dag la //
translated: in others with such a nature,

original: de ltar bkod de de yi tshe //
analyzed: de ltar bkod de de yi tshe //
translated: when it is thus arranged,

original: mi 'dod na yang bsgrub byar 'gyur //
analyzed: mi 'dod na yang bsgrub byar 'gyur //
translated: even if not desired, it becomes the object to be established.

original: bya ba'i rkyen thams cad ni dus gsum gyi yul can yin no //
analyzed: bya ba'i rkyen thams cad ni dus gsum gyi yul can yin no //
translated: All the conditions of action have the three times as their object.

original: des na phyis bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ba bsgrub byar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na phyis bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ba bsgrub byar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, what is to be established later becomes the object to be established.

original: ci ltar phyis bsgrub par bya ba 'di nyid du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar phyis bsgrub par bya ba 'di nyid du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does what is to be established later become just this?

original: de'i tshe de lta bu'i bdag nyid ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe de lta bu'i bdag nyid ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: At that time, it is taught that it is not of such a nature.

original: de ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin mod kyi /
analyzed: de ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin mod kyi /
translated: That is indeed the object to be established,

original: de'i tshe sgrub par byed pa nyid du nye bar bstan pas /
analyzed: de'i tshe sgrub par byed pa nyid du nye bar bstan pas /
translated: but at that time, it is taught as the means of establishment.

original: de'i tshe bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, at that time, it is not the object to be established.

original: ma grub pa ni gzhan la sgrub par byed par yang mi 'gyur te des na de phyi nas bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: ma grub pa ni gzhan la sgrub par byed par yang mi 'gyur te des na de phyi nas bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: And if it is not established, it cannot establish something else, and so it would be something to be established later.

original: des na phyis kyi tshe bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan par bya ba de dam bca' bar 'gyur ro//üîΩgal te ci ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i sgras bum par bya ba zhes bya ba lta bu byed pa po la ltos pa'i bsgrub bya rtogs par byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du 'grub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa yang rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin
analyzed: des na phyis kyi tshe bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan par bya ba de dam bca' bar 'gyur ro// gal te ci ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i sgras bum par bya ba zhes bya ba lta bu byed pa po la ltos pa'i bsgrub bya rtogs par byed pa ma yin pa de bzhin du 'grub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa yang rtogs par 'gyur ba ma yin
translated: Thus, it would be a thesis that is to be established later.üîΩIf you say, ‚ÄúJust as the word ‚Äòto be established‚Äô does not indicate that which is to be established in dependence on an agent, as in ‚Äòthe vase is to be established,‚Äô in the same way, the word ‚Äòto be established‚Äô in the phrase ‚Äòto be established as a proof‚Äô would not indicate that which is to be established,‚Äù

original: pa'i phyir ji ltar sgrub par byed pa ma grub pa dam bca' bar thal zhe na /
analyzed: pa'i phyir ji ltar sgrub par byed pa ma grub pa dam bca' bar thal zhe na /
translated: then we reply, ‚ÄúJust as the word ‚Äòto be established‚Äô does not indicate that which is to be established in dependence on an agent, as in ‚Äòthe vase is to be established,‚Äô in the same way, the word ‚Äòto be established‚Äô in the phrase ‚Äòto be established as a proof‚Äô would not indicate that which is to be established.‚ÄùüîΩIf you say, ‚ÄúJust as the word ‚Äòto be established‚Äô does not indicate that which is to be established in dependence on an agent, as in ‚Äòthe vase is to be established,‚Äô in the same way, the word ‚Äòto be established‚Äô in the phrase ‚Äòto be established as a proof‚Äô would not indicate that which is to be established,‚Äù

original: gal te 'di shes par byed pa'i skabs ma yin na 'dir bden pa zhig na /üîΩshes byed skabs kyis ma grub pa //
analyzed: gal te 'di shes par byed pa'i skabs ma yin na 'dir bden pa zhig na / shes byed skabs kyis ma grub pa //
translated: then we reply, ‚ÄúIf it is not the context for understanding, then it is true that it is not established.üîΩBut if it is the context for understanding,

original: thams cad rtogs par byed pa yin //
analyzed: thams cad rtogs par byed pa yin //
translated: then it is understood by all.

original: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i sgra //
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i sgra //
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äòto be established‚Äô

original: 'dod pa'i khyad par la brten min //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khyad par la brten min //
translated: not on the basis of a particular desire.
