original: shes par byed pa'i skabs kyis gsal bar bya ba byed pa po la ltos pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la gzhan pa'i bsgrub par bya ba thams cad bsgrub par bya ba'i sgras sdud par byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: shes par byed pa'i skabs kyis gsal bar bya ba byed pa po la ltos pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la gzhan pa'i bsgrub par bya ba thams cad bsgrub par bya ba'i sgras sdud par byed pa nyid do //
translated: The word ‚Äúprobandum‚Äù includes all other proban-da, since they are to be established in dependence on the proban-da that is based on the agent.

original: des na bsgrub par bya ba gzhan rnam par gcod par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na bsgrub par bya ba gzhan rnam par gcod par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not possible to exclude other proban-da.

original: byed pa po'i bsgrub par bya ba rnam par gcod pa ni shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs @202b kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa po'i bsgrub par bya ba rnam par gcod pa ni shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs @202b kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the context of the reason that establishes the probandum based on the agent is the context of the reason that establishes the probandum based on the agent.

original: 'ga' zhig rgyu dang bcas pas 'gyur ba bzhin du rgyu med pa rnams kyang 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig rgyu dang bcas pas 'gyur ba bzhin du rgyu med pa rnams kyang 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that things that lack a cause are like things that have a cause.

original: thams cad thams cad du 'gyur bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad thams cad du 'gyur bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it follows that everything would be produced from everything.

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa ma yin pa'i sgrub par byed pa phyogs yin zhes bya ba phyogs yin zhes bya ba'i rgyu mtshan gzhan yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa ma yin pa'i sgrub par byed pa phyogs yin zhes bya ba phyogs yin zhes bya ba'i rgyu mtshan gzhan yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The reason ‚Äúbecause it is a proof‚Äù is not a reason that proves what is not taught to be a proof.

original: des na bsgrub bya'i sgra ni 'dod pa'i khyad par la brten par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na bsgrub bya'i sgra ni 'dod pa'i khyad par la brten par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúprobandum‚Äù cannot be based on a specific desire.

original: byed pa po'i bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa ni shes par byed pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: byed pa po'i bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog pa ni shes par byed pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs pa ma yin no //
translated: The opposite of the probandum of the agent is not similar to that because it is the context of the proof.üîΩTherefore, the example and reason

original: des na dpe dang gtan tshigs dag / ma grub dper ni byas pa yin//
analyzed: des na dpe dang gtan tshigs dag / ma grub dper ni byas pa yin//
translated: are not established. The example is produced.

original: gzhan du ri bong rva la sogs //
analyzed: gzhan du ri bong rva la sogs //
translated: Otherwise, the rabbit horn and so on

original: ma grub kun kyang bsgrub byar 'gyur //
analyzed: ma grub kun kyang bsgrub byar 'gyur //
translated: would all be unestablished.

original: de ltar yang /üîΩdpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub smra //
analyzed: de ltar yang / dpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub smra //
translated: In that way,

original: dam bca' bar ni thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dam bca' bar ni thal bar 'gyur //
translated: the example and reason are said to be unestablished.üîΩThe thesis would follow.

original: zhes so // sgra ni mi rtag pa ste byas pa'i phyir bum pa bzhin no zhes grangs can la ltos nas sam /
analyzed: zhes so // sgra ni mi rtag pa ste byas pa'i phyir bum pa bzhin no zhes grangs can la ltos nas sam /
translated: Sound is impermanent because it is produced, like a pot, in reliance on the SƒÅ·πÉkhya.

original: yang na mig gis gzung bar bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' bzhin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na mig gis gzung bar bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' bzhin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or else, like space, it is the object of the eye.

original: gal te skabs la ma ltos par dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid byas pa yin la /
analyzed: gal te skabs la ma ltos par dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid byas pa yin la /
translated: If the definition of a thesis is made without regard to the context,

original: de bzhin du ri bong gi rva la sogs pa yang bsgrub bya nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du ri bong gi rva la sogs pa yang bsgrub bya nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then it follows, absurdly, that the horns of a rabbit and so on are also the probandum.

original: 'on te yang bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bcas pa'o zhes bya ba 'dir yang shes par byed pa'i skabs dang 'brel pa yin la bsgrub par bya ba thams cad dam bca' bar thal ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on te yang bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bcas pa'o zhes bya ba 'dir yang shes par byed pa'i skabs dang 'brel pa yin la bsgrub par bya ba thams cad dam bca' bar thal ba ma yin te /
translated: But if you say that the thesis is that which is taught as the probandum, then here too the context is what makes it understood, and it is not the case that everything that is taught as the probandum is a thesis.

original: 'on kyang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan te /üîΩlas la bya ba'i rkyen brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan te / las la bya ba'i rkyen brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But it is taught as the probandum, and the word is is used in the sense of is to be.üîΩ This is because the word is is used to express the condition of the object, and the object is what the agent desires.

original: las kyang byed pa po'i phugs 'dod las yin no zhes bya bas gang la khyad par du 'phags pa yod pa'i khyad par can yin no //
analyzed: las kyang byed pa po'i phugs 'dod las yin no zhes bya bas gang la khyad par du 'phags pa yod pa'i khyad par can yin no //
translated: Thus it is the qualifier that has the property of being superior to something else.

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid di 'dod pa ni byed pa yin pa'i phyir phugs 'dod ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid di 'dod pa ni byed pa yin pa'i phyir phugs 'dod ma yin no //
translated: The proof itself is not the thesis, because it is the action, not the object of desire.

original: dper na 'bras chan zo shig ces bya ba la 'o ma zos pa'i bya bas byed pa po yin yang /
analyzed: dper na 'bras chan zo shig ces bya ba la 'o ma zos pa'i bya bas byed pa po yin yang /
translated: For example, in the statement ‚ÄúEat the rice,‚Äù the rice is the object of the action of eating,

original: byed pa nyid du brjod par 'dod pas na las nyid ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: byed pa nyid du brjod par 'dod pas na las nyid ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: but because the desire is for the action of eating, the rice is not the object of desire.

original: de bzhin du 'dod par gyur pa las yin gyi 'dod par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dod par gyur pa las yin gyi 'dod par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, the thesis is the object of desire, but not the object of the desire.

original: gzhan yang mtshon par bya ba nyid kyi skabs su bab par 'gyur ba'i yan lag lda po dag las /
analyzed: gzhan yang mtshon par bya ba nyid kyi skabs su bab par 'gyur ba'i yan lag lda po dag las /
translated: Moreover, among the parts that are to be applied in the definition of the thesis,

original: dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid ni yan lag gzhan gyi mtshan nyid kyi yul spangs te gnas pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid ni yan lag gzhan gyi mtshan nyid kyi yul spangs te gnas pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: the definition of the thesis is not the proof, because it is the object of the definition of another part.

original: @203a * // sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i bsgrub par bya ba bstan par dam bca' ba yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @203a * // sgrub par byed par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i bsgrub par bya ba bstan par dam bca' ba yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is understood that the thesis is the statement of the probandum that is to be proven by the proof.

original: de bzhin du grub pa'i mtha' rnam pa bzhi po rgyud thams cad pa dang / mi mthun pa'i rgyu dang dbang du byed pa dang / khas blangs pa'i tshul gyis mtshan nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin du grub pa'i mtha' rnam pa bzhi po rgyud thams cad pa dang / mi mthun pa'i rgyu dang dbang du byed pa dang / khas blangs pa'i tshul gyis mtshan nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir /
translated: Likewise, the four tenets are established by the mode of assertion, in order to establish the characteristics of the tantras of all, the cause of incompatibility, and the subjugation.

original: khas blangs pa'i sgrub pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid kyi bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa dam bstan pa dam bca' ba yin par rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: khas blangs pa'i sgrub pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid kyi bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa dam bstan pa dam bca' ba yin par rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, the definition of the proof of assertion is understood to be the thesis that is taught.

original: ha cang thal ba ma yin pas skyon med do zhe na /
analyzed: ha cang thal ba ma yin pas skyon med do zhe na /
translated: Since it is not an extreme consequence, there is no fault.

original: 'di thams cad ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di thams cad ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: All of this is not so.

original: thams cad rnam 'gas ma grub phyir //üîΩdes na las la sogs pa yi ;
analyzed: thams cad rnam 'gas ma grub phyir // des na las la sogs pa yi ;
translated: Because everything is not established in any way,üîΩtherefore, the reply that is set forth

original: / khyad par nye bar bkod pa yi //
analyzed: / khyad par nye bar bkod pa yi //
translated: with the distinctions of karma and so on

original: lan gyis rnam 'byed nus ma yin //
analyzed: lan gyis rnam 'byed nus ma yin //
translated: is not able to differentiate.

original: snga ma grub pa'i rang bzhin phyir //
analyzed: snga ma grub pa'i rang bzhin phyir //
translated: Because the nature of the former is established,

original: bsgrub bya'i yan lag ces rung min //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i yan lag ces rung min //
translated: it is not suitable to be a branch of the probandum.

original: gang gis khas blangs mtshan nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: gang gis khas blangs mtshan nyid 'gyur //
translated: By whom is the definition of assertion transformed?

original: de yang grub mtha' nyid du mtshungs //
analyzed: de yang grub mtha' nyid du mtshungs //
translated: That is also equivalent to the tenets.

original: de gtan tshigs nyid du khas blangs kyang bsgrub par bya ba gdon mi za bar khas len par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de gtan tshigs nyid du khas blangs kyang bsgrub par bya ba gdon mi za bar khas len par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Even if you accept that as a reason, you would certainly have to accept that it is the probandum,

original: ma grub pa ni gtan tshigs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa ni gtan tshigs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that which is not established is not a reason.

original: bya ba'i rkyen rnams ni dus gsum gyi yul can du bstan zin to //
analyzed: bya ba'i rkyen rnams ni dus gsum gyi yul can du bstan zin to //
translated: The conditions of action have already been explained as having objects in the three times.

original: khas len pa'i sgra yang dus gsum gyi yul can ni rkyen can nyid do //
analyzed: khas len pa'i sgra yang dus gsum gyi yul can ni rkyen can nyid do //
translated: The word ‚Äúaccept‚Äù also has conditions in the three times.

original: bya ba smos pa ni nye bar mtshon pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba smos pa ni nye bar mtshon pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The mention of action is for the sake of illustration.

original: des na thams cad grub mtha' mtshungs pa nyid de /
analyzed: des na thams cad grub mtha' mtshungs pa nyid de /
translated: Therefore, all are similar in their tenets.

original: des na grub mtha'i tshul ni lan ma yin no //
analyzed: des na grub mtha'i tshul ni lan ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, tenets are not a response.

original: 'on te bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skabs su sgrub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pas bsgrub bya nye bar bstan pa dam bca' ba yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba nyid dam bca' ba yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on te bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skabs su sgrub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pas bsgrub bya nye bar bstan pa dam bca' ba yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba nyid dam bca' ba yin gyi /
translated: But if you say that in the context of the definition of the probandum and the proof, the probandum is the thesis because it is the statement of the probandum that is excluded from the definition of the proof,üîΩthen the probandum is the thesis.

original: sgrub par byed par bstan pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgrub par byed par bstan pa ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is not taught to be a proof.

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: don ma grub pa'i phyir na mtshan nyid bsgrub pa'i sngon rol du yan lag gi mtshan nyid thams cad ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don ma grub pa'i phyir na mtshan nyid bsgrub pa'i sngon rol du yan lag gi mtshan nyid thams cad ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the meaning is not established. Before the proof of the definition, all the characteristics of the parts are not established.

original: des bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bca' ba zhes bya bas bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa thams cad dam bca' bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: des bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bca' ba zhes bya bas bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa thams cad dam bca' bar 'gyur te /
translated: If it is taught to be that which is to be proven, then all teachings that are to be proven would be theses, because they are called theses.

original: de las ma gtogs pa ni sgrub par byed pa nyid yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las ma gtogs pa ni sgrub par byed pa nyid yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: And that which is not included in that would be a proof.

original: yang na sgrub par byed pa'i bstan pa las ma gtogs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa dam bca' ba nyid do zhes bya pa'i rnam par dbye ba 'di bya bar @203b ji ltar nus /
analyzed: yang na sgrub par byed pa'i bstan pa las ma gtogs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa dam bca' ba nyid do zhes bya pa'i rnam par dbye ba 'di bya bar @203b ji ltar nus /
translated: Or else, how could this distinction be made: ‚ÄúThat which is a teaching that is to be proven, but is not included in the teaching of a proof, is a thesis‚Äù?

original: 'o na ni the tshom du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni the tshom du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But then it would be a doubt.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: 'di la lan du 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di la lan du 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the answer to this will be explained later.

original: gal te bsgrub par bya bar zhes las la bya rkyen ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya bar zhes las la bya rkyen ma yin nam /
translated: If it is said that ‚Äúthat which is to be proven‚Äù is a case of the accusative, is it not a condition?

original: las kyang byed pa'i 'dod phugs yin no //
analyzed: las kyang byed pa'i 'dod phugs yin no //
translated: and action is the ultimate goal of desire.

original: thams nyid du 'dod pa ni sgrub par byed pa nyid ma yin pas de ci ltar de bsgrub bya nyid du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: thams nyid du 'dod pa ni sgrub par byed pa nyid ma yin pas de ci ltar de bsgrub bya nyid du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But if the means of knowledge is not itself an object of knowledge, how can it be the means of knowing?

original: 'di ni med de sgrub par byed pa nyid thabs nyid kyis bsgrub bya nyid du 'dod pa'i phugs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni med de sgrub par byed pa nyid thabs nyid kyis bsgrub bya nyid du 'dod pa'i phugs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is not so, because the means of knowledge is accepted as the ultimate goal of the means of knowing.

original: 'dir khyad par du 'phags pa'i rkyen ni khas blangs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir khyad par du 'phags pa'i rkyen ni khas blangs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And there is no special reason to accept this.

original: kha cig ni sbyor ba'i rnam par dbye ba khas len pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: kha cig ni sbyor ba'i rnam par dbye ba khas len pa'i phyir te /
translated: Some accept the analysis of the means of knowledge,

original: gzhan dag gi ni khyad par du 'phags pa spong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag gi ni khyad par du 'phags pa spong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: but not the special reason for rejecting the means of knowledge of others.

original: 'byung ba'i rkyen nam /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i rkyen nam /
translated: The means of knowledge is a condition of the object of knowledge,

original: gcig gi tshig kyang der gtsug lag tu 'gyur ba ma yin te /üîΩre lde dag tu byed par 'gyur ro //üîΩre lde rnams su byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig gi tshig kyang der gtsug lag tu 'gyur ba ma yin te / re lde dag tu byed par 'gyur ro // re lde rnams su byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: but the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is not accepted as part of the treatise.üîΩFor it is accepted that the means of knowledge is the means of knowing the object of knowledge,

original: khas len pa'i grub mtha' yang yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: khas len pa'i grub mtha' yang yod pa nyid do //
translated: and that the object of knowledge is the object of the means of knowledge.üîΩAnd the treatise does not say that the means of knowledge is the means of knowing the object of knowledge only.üîΩThe treatise does not say that the means of knowledge is the means of knowing the object of knowledge only.

original: des na bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bca' ba'o zhes bya ba 'di ni mi rung ngo //
analyzed: des na bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bca' ba'o zhes bya ba 'di ni mi rung ngo //
translated: Therefore, it is not correct to say that the statement of the probandum is the thesis.

original: 'dir chos sam chos can nam tshogs pa bsgrub bya yin grang na /
analyzed: 'dir chos sam chos can nam tshogs pa bsgrub bya yin grang na /
translated: Here, is the property, the subject, or the collection of the two the probandum?

original: de la / chos bsgrub bya ni chos mthun med //
analyzed: de la / chos bsgrub bya ni chos mthun med //
translated: If the property is the probandum, then there is no similar instance.

original: chos can gtan tshigs don med 'gyur //
analyzed: chos can gtan tshigs don med 'gyur //
translated: The reason would be pointless.

original: gal te chos bsgrub par bya ba yin la bstan pa dam bca' ba yin na ni rtag pa nyid ces bya ba dam bcas pa yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te chos bsgrub par bya ba yin la bstan pa dam bca' ba yin na ni rtag pa nyid ces bya ba dam bcas pa yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the property is the probandum and the statement is the thesis, then permanence would be the thesis.

original: de la bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mtshungs pas de'i chos yod pa'i dpe ni dpe yin no zhes bya ba dpe'i mtshan nyin 'gal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mtshungs pas de'i chos yod pa'i dpe ni dpe yin no zhes bya ba dpe'i mtshan nyin 'gal bar 'gyur te /
translated: The definition of an example would be contradicted: ‚ÄúAn example is that which has the property of the probandum and is similar to the subject.‚Äù

original: gang gi bum pa la sogs de'i chos yod par 'gyur ba bsgrub par bya ba'i chos mi rtag pa nyid la ni /
analyzed: gang gi bum pa la sogs de'i chos yod par 'gyur ba bsgrub par bya ba'i chos mi rtag pa nyid la ni /
translated: The example would have the probandum, impermanence, because it is the property of a pot, etc.

original: skye ba dang ldan pa la sogs pa de'i chos yod pa yang ma yin no chos can yin na ni grub pa'i phyir bsgrub bya grub pa ni gtan tshigs so zhes bya ba mi 'thad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye ba dang ldan pa la sogs pa de'i chos yod pa yang ma yin no chos can yin na ni grub pa'i phyir bsgrub bya grub pa ni gtan tshigs so zhes bya ba mi 'thad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Nor does the property of that which possesses arising, etc., exist. If it were the property possessor, then because it is established, it is not tenable to say, ‚ÄúThe probandum is established by the reason.‚Äù

original: 'on te gnyis ka bsgrub bya yin na phyogs gnyi ga la 'gyur ba'i skyon yod do //
analyzed: 'on te gnyis ka bsgrub bya yin na phyogs gnyi ga la 'gyur ba'i skyon yod do //
translated: But if both are the probandum, then the error arises that both positions are the probandum.

original: gal te tshogs pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te tshogs pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: But if the collection is not the probandum,

original: tshogs pa ni grub pa ma yin la /
analyzed: tshogs pa ni grub pa ma yin la /
translated: then the collection is not established,

original: skye ba dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i chos ma yin pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: skye ba dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i chos ma yin pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yin no zhe na /
translated: and that which possesses arising, etc., is not a property.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here NƒÅgƒÅrjuna explains:

original: tshogs pa bsgrub bya nyid yin na'ang //
analyzed: tshogs pa bsgrub bya nyid yin na'ang //
translated: If the collection is the probandum,

original: gnyis po phan tshun khyad par can //
analyzed: gnyis po phan tshun khyad par can //
translated: then the two are mutually distinguished.üîΩAt that time the characteristics of the reason

original: bsgrub bya de tshe gtan tshigs dang // dpe yi mtshan nyid ma grub gyur //üîΩdpe dang chos mthun @204a * //
analyzed: bsgrub bya de tshe gtan tshigs dang // dpe yi mtshan nyid ma grub gyur // dpe dang chos mthun @204a * //
translated: and example are not established.

original: pas bsgrub bya sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid yin la /
analyzed: pas bsgrub bya sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid yin la /
translated: The characteristic of a reason is called ‚Äúestablishing the probandum through similarity with the example.‚Äù

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pas de'i chos yod pa'i dpe ni dpe'o zhes bya ba ni dpe'o mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pas de'i chos yod pa'i dpe ni dpe'o zhes bya ba ni dpe'o mtshan nyid do //
translated: This is the definition of example.

original: 'di ni tshogs pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin na mi 'byor par 'gyur ro //üîΩ'di ltar tshogs pa ni tshogs pa can las tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir gnyis po de nyid bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par can gyi chos skye ba can la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: 'di ni tshogs pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin na mi 'byor par 'gyur ro // 'di ltar tshogs pa ni tshogs pa can las tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir gnyis po de nyid bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par can gyi chos skye ba can la sogs pas ni /
translated: But this is not correct, because the collection is the probandum.üîΩFor, since the collection is not different from the members of the collection, the two are the probandum.

original: dpe la chos mthun pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dpe la chos mthun pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The example does not have the property of the probandum, because it has the property of the probandum qualified by arising and so on.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'o gtan tshigs ni chos can la yod par gzhan dag la ma grub pas na gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'o gtan tshigs ni chos can la yod par gzhan dag la ma grub pas na gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: The reason does not have the property of the subject, because it is not established for the other party.

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can dang bum pa la sogs pa'i dpe dag chos mthun pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyad par du byas pa'i chos can dang bum pa la sogs pa'i dpe dag chos mthun pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The example does not have the property of the subject, because the subject qualified by impermanence and the example, such as a pot, do not have the property in common.

original: des na dpe'i mtshan nyid kyang med pas dpe dang gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ma grub po //
analyzed: des na dpe'i mtshan nyid kyang med pas dpe dang gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ma grub po //
translated: Therefore, since the definition of example is also nonexistent, the definition of example and reason is not established.

original: tshogs ba la mi srid pa'i phyir bsgrub chos can la 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: tshogs ba la mi srid pa'i phyir bsgrub chos can la 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: Since it is impossible for the collection, the term would apply to the subject of the proposition.

original: tshogs pa la 'jug pa'i sgra ni yan lag rnams la yang 'jug pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so zhe na /
analyzed: tshogs pa la 'jug pa'i sgra ni yan lag rnams la yang 'jug pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so zhe na /
translated: The term that applies to the collection also applies to the parts, according to the method.

original: de yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: de yang mi rung ste /
translated: That also is not correct.

original: mi srid phyir na bsgrub bya'i sgra //üîΩgal te chos can la 'jug 'dod //
analyzed: mi srid phyir na bsgrub bya'i sgra // gal te chos can la 'jug 'dod //
translated: Since it is impossible, the term of the probandumüîΩIf you assert that it applies to the subject,

original: bstan bcos ci bya ci rigs par //
analyzed: bstan bcos ci bya ci rigs par //
translated: Then the treatise would be appropriate

original: rang nyid 'jug par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: rang nyid 'jug par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: For it to apply to itself.

original: de'i tshe mtshan nyid brjod pas ci zhig bya ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe mtshan nyid brjod pas ci zhig bya ste /
translated: At that time, what would be the point of stating the definition?

original: ci ltar nye bar brjod pa'i mtshan nyid don la mi srid pa'i phyir gzhan du brjod par bya ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: ci ltar nye bar brjod pa'i mtshan nyid don la mi srid pa'i phyir gzhan du brjod par bya ba de bzhin du /
translated: Since the defined term is impossible in the object, it is stated elsewhere.

original: gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yang ci ltar go bar byed par 'gyur ba gzhan du rtag par 'gyur ro de bzhin du dpe'i mtshan nyid kyang yin pas na bstan bcos don med do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yang ci ltar go bar byed par 'gyur ba gzhan du rtag par 'gyur ro de bzhin du dpe'i mtshan nyid kyang yin pas na bstan bcos don med do //
translated: The nature of the reason and so on would also be otherwise, i.e., permanent, and so the treatise would be pointless.

original: gal te phyogs chos de chas khyab pa ni gtan tshigs shes /
analyzed: gal te phyogs chos de chas khyab pa ni gtan tshigs shes /
translated: If the property of the subject that is pervaded by a part of that reason is the reason,

original: khyod kyang nye bar btags nas phyogs kyi sgra chos can la 'jug par 'dod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: khyod kyang nye bar btags nas phyogs kyi sgra chos can la 'jug par 'dod pa ma yin nam /
translated: and you also assert that the term pak·π£a is applied to the subject by metonymy,

original: de lta yang phyogs ni chos can te /
analyzed: de lta yang phyogs ni chos can te /
translated: then the subject is the pak·π£a,

original: yan lag la spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro zhes te /
analyzed: yan lag la spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro zhes te /
translated: because the universal is metonymized in the part.

original: 'dir yang skyon de nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir yang skyon de nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: In that case, the same error would occur here.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it will not,üîΩbecause:

original: 'di ltar / shes par 'dod pa'i khyad par can //
analyzed: 'di ltar / shes par 'dod pa'i khyad par can //
translated: The subject is the particular that is the basis of the desire to know.

original: chos can phyogs kyi rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: chos can phyogs kyi rang bzhin nyid //
translated: It is the nature of the pak·π£a, the subject.

original: gang tshe de chos gtan tshigs ni //
analyzed: gang tshe de chos gtan tshigs ni //
translated: When that property is the reason,

original: ci ltar 'dir ni nyer btags nyid //
analyzed: ci ltar 'dir ni nyer btags nyid //
translated: how is it metonymized here?

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos @204b kyi mtshan nyid shes par 'dod pa khyad par can gyi chos kyi chos gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos @204b kyi mtshan nyid shes par 'dod pa khyad par can gyi chos kyi chos gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The definition of the probandum is: that which is the property of a specific object of knowledge that is desired to be known.

original: dngos su phyogs su 'dzin pa yin la /
analyzed: dngos su phyogs su 'dzin pa yin la /
translated: That is the explicit thesis.

original: de'i chos gtan tshigs yin pa de'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: de'i chos gtan tshigs yin pa de'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: Since the property of that is the reason, there is no fault.

original: gal te tshogs pa ma grub pa ni ci ltar de'i chos shes par bya bar 'grub ce na /
analyzed: gal te tshogs pa ma grub pa ni ci ltar de'i chos shes par bya bar 'grub ce na /
translated: If the collection is not established, how can it be established as the property of that?

original: de yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: de yang mi rigs te /
translated: That also is not correct.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / gal te tshogs ba grub 'gyur na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te tshogs ba grub 'gyur na //
translated: If the collection were established,

original: 'di ni ci ltar phyogs su 'gyur //üîΩbsgrub bya'i chos la the tshom ni //
analyzed: 'di ni ci ltar phyogs su 'gyur // bsgrub bya'i chos la the tshom ni //
translated: how could it be a thesis?üîΩDoubt about the probandum

original: zan chos can tsam nyid phyogs //
analyzed: zan chos can tsam nyid phyogs //
translated: is a thesis that is merely a subject.

original: gang gi tshe tshogs pa grub pa de'i tshe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe tshogs pa grub pa de'i tshe na /
translated: When the collection is established,

original: 'di shes par 'dod pa'i khyad par can ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di shes par 'dod pa'i khyad par can ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: then it is not a specific object of knowledge that is desired to be known.

original: phyogs ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: phyogs ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore it is not a thesis.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus:

original: de la yang rang nyid bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa ni phyogs yin no zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de la yang rang nyid bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa ni phyogs yin no zhes gsungs so //
translated: In that regard, that which is itself asserted to be the probandum is a thesis.

original: gal te grub na ni ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa yin /
analyzed: gal te grub na ni ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa yin /
translated: If it were established, then how could it be called that which is to be established?

original: de'i phyir phyogs chos ces zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir phyogs chos ces zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
translated: Therefore, what is the meaning of the expression ‚Äúproperty of the subject‚Äù?

original: bsgrub par bya ba la the tshom za ba'i chos can gyi chos so zhes bya ba yin no //üîΩde'i tshe yang ji ltar tshogs pa ma grub na ;
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba la the tshom za ba'i chos can gyi chos so zhes bya ba yin no // de'i tshe yang ji ltar tshogs pa ma grub na ;
translated: It means ‚Äúthe property of a subject about which there is doubt concerning the probandum.‚Äù

original: de'i chos mi 'grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i chos mi 'grub par 'gyur /
translated: Even at that time, how could the property not be established if the possessor of the property is not established?

original: 'o na ji ltar yan lag la spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar yan lag la spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad ce na /
translated: Well then, how is it that it was explained that ‚Äúbecause the universal is figuratively designated in the parts‚Äù?

original: 'di brjod pa /
analyzed: 'di brjod pa /
translated: This is stated:

original: nye bar btags pa rab 'jug ni //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa rab 'jug ni //
translated: The figurative designation is used

original: rtsod pa spong ba'i don du yin //
analyzed: rtsod pa spong ba'i don du yin //
translated: for the purpose of eliminating objections.

original: chos can chos zhes brjod na ni //
analyzed: chos can chos zhes brjod na ni //
translated: If it is said that the subject and the property are the same,

original: mtshan nyid ha cang thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ha cang thal bar 'gyur //
translated: then there is the absurd consequence that the definition is too narrow.

original: 'dir rtsod par byed de /
analyzed: 'dir rtsod par byed de /
translated: Here someone objects:

original: phyogs chos ches bya ba 'di ni rung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs chos ches bya ba 'di ni rung ba ma yin te /
translated: This expression ‚Äúproperty of the subject‚Äù is not correct,

original: gtan tshigs kyi rang gi ngo bo spyod pa'i dus na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi rang gi ngo bo spyod pa'i dus na /
translated: because when the intrinsic nature of the reason is being used,

original: phyogs srid pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyogs srid pa ni ma yin no //
translated: the subject does not exist.

original: sa phyogs la sogs pa'i chos can tsam la gtan tshigs mthong nas khyab par dran pa ni /
analyzed: sa phyogs la sogs pa'i chos can tsam la gtan tshigs mthong nas khyab par dran pa ni /
translated: Having seen the reason in the mere subject, such as the place, one recalls the pervasion.

original: phyis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i blor 'gyur ro//
analyzed: phyis bsgrub par bya ba'i chos mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i blor 'gyur ro//
translated: Later, the mind becomes directed to the property to be established, such as impermanence.

original: sngar ni blo de med pa'i phyir chos can tsam rtogs pas lus par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: sngar ni blo de med pa'i phyir chos can tsam rtogs pas lus par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Previously, because that mind did not exist, one realizes only the mere subject, and so the reason is left out.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la the tshom za'o zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la the tshom za'o zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If one says, ‚ÄúOne doubts the property to be established,‚Äù that is not so,

original: nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no certainty.

original: the tshom za ba la gtan tshigs 'jug pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: the tshom za ba la gtan tshigs 'jug pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not the case that the reason does not apply to one who doubts?

original: ci ltar nges pa med ce na /
analyzed: ci ltar nges pa med ce na /
translated: How can there be no certainty?

original: ma yin te grub pa dang gsal ba tsam bzlog par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te grub pa dang gsal ba tsam bzlog par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because it is only the established and the manifest that are to be refuted.

original: nges pa dang gsal ba la ni gtan tshigs 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nges pa dang gsal ba la ni gtan tshigs 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: The reason does not apply to the ascertained and the manifest,

original: dgos pa med pa'i phyir dang mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgos pa med pa'i phyir dang mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no need and because it is impossible.

original: de'i phyir chos can gyi chos zhes bya ba nyid brjod par bya ba yin no zhe'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos can gyi chos zhes bya ba nyid brjod par bya ba yin no zhe'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said that the mere property of the subject is to be stated.

original: 'di brjod pa chos can gyi chos zhes smos na /üîΩdpe'i chos can gyi chos kyang @205a * //
analyzed: 'di brjod pa chos can gyi chos zhes smos na / dpe'i chos can gyi chos kyang @205a * //
translated: If the word ‚Äúproperty‚Äù were mentioned,üîΩthe property of the example would also be a reason.

original: gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur bas mig gis gzung ba nyid kyang gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur bas mig gis gzung ba nyid kyang gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: And the fact that it is perceived by the eye would also be a reason.

original: des na sa phyogs su 'gyur ba'i chos can gzung bar bya ba'i phyir phyogs smos so //
analyzed: des na sa phyogs su 'gyur ba'i chos can gzung bar bya ba'i phyir phyogs smos so //
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúsubject‚Äù is mentioned in order to indicate the subject that is the locus.

original: ji ltar chos can nyid phyogs su 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar chos can nyid phyogs su 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How can the subject itself be the locus?

original: yan lag la spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do //üîΩgal te gtan tshigs 'dzin pa'i dus na /
analyzed: yan lag la spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // gal te gtan tshigs 'dzin pa'i dus na /
translated: Because the universal is figuratively designated as a part.

original: tshogs pa blo la gnas pa ma yin pa de lta na yang phyis 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: tshogs pa blo la gnas pa ma yin pa de lta na yang phyis 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Even if the collection is not present to the mind at the time of apprehending the reason, it will be present later.

original: gal te phyis 'gyur ba de dang po ci lta yod ce na /
analyzed: gal te phyis 'gyur ba de dang po ci lta yod ce na /
translated: If it is present later, how can it be nonexistent at first?

original: de nyid kyi phyir nye bar btags pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir nye bar btags pa yin te /
translated: For that very reason it is figurative.

original: gzhan du na dngos nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan du na dngos nyid do //
translated: Otherwise, it would be real.

original: nye bar btags pa ni blos sgro btags pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa ni blos sgro btags pa'o //
translated: Figurative designation is the superimposition by the mind.

original: ci ltar med pa la blor 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar med pa la blor 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How can it be the mind if it is nonexistent?

original: ci yid la bsams pa la yang dbul por 'gyur ram /
analyzed: ci yid la bsams pa la yang dbul por 'gyur ram /
translated: Or is it that the poor man is the one who thinks of it?

original: snal ma 'di dag gis ras yug chen btags so zhes bya ba ni mthong ba ma yin no //üîΩde la gal te ras yug chen yin na btag par bya ba ma yin la /
analyzed: snal ma 'di dag gis ras yug chen btags so zhes bya ba ni mthong ba ma yin no // de la gal te ras yug chen yin na btag par bya ba ma yin la /
translated: It is not seen that the cloth is woven from these threads.üîΩIf it is cloth, it is not being woven.

original: gal te btag par bya ba yin na ras yug chen ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te btag par bya ba yin na ras yug chen ma yin te /
translated: If it is being woven, it is not cloth.

original: ras yug chen yang yin la btag par bya ba yang yin no zhes bya ba ni 'gal lo //
analyzed: ras yug chen yang yin la btag par bya ba yang yin no zhes bya ba ni 'gal lo //
translated: It is contradictory to say that it is cloth and it is being woven.

original: de la smra ba po'i bsam pa ni 'di yin te ras yug chen du 'gyur ba 'di btag par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la smra ba po'i bsam pa ni 'di yin te ras yug chen du 'gyur ba 'di btag par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The speaker‚Äôs intention is that this cloth is being woven to become cloth.

original: 'di la yang dgos pa ci yod ce na /
analyzed: 'di la yang dgos pa ci yod ce na /
translated: What is the purpose of this?

original: dgos pa yod de /
analyzed: dgos pa yod de /
translated: The purpose is this:

original: snal ma zhes brjod na ras chen dang / yug phran la sogs pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snal ma zhes brjod na ras chen dang / yug phran la sogs pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one says ‚Äúthread,‚Äù it would follow that it is cloth, a small piece of cloth, and so on.

original: de'i phyir de skad smos pa ni gzhan bzlog pa'i don du yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de skad smos pa ni gzhan bzlog pa'i don du yin no //
translated: Therefore, the statement is made in order to exclude others.

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang bsgrub bya grub par 'gyur bas phyogs su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i chos yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang bsgrub bya grub par 'gyur bas phyogs su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i chos yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Likewise, here, since the probandum is established, there is no fallacy of the subject being the property of the probandum, because it is the property of that.

original: dpe'i chos can gyi chos thal ba yang med do //
analyzed: dpe'i chos can gyi chos thal ba yang med do //
translated: Nor is there the fallacy of the subject being the property of the example.

original: des na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la the tshom za ba'i chos can gyi chos bya ba'i don yin no //
analyzed: des na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la the tshom za ba'i chos can gyi chos bya ba'i don yin no //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the subject being the property of the probandum is that there is doubt about the property of the probandum.

original: 'o na ci ltar de'i cha ni bsam pa'i dbang gis de'i chos yin gyi /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar de'i cha ni bsam pa'i dbang gis de'i chos yin gyi /
translated: Well, how is it that the part is the property of that by the power of intention,

original: de'i phyogs gcig ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyogs gcig ni ma yin te /
translated: but not one part of that?

original: phyogs zhes bya ba'i sgra spyi la mi bya ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: phyogs zhes bya ba'i sgra spyi la mi bya ba'i phyir ro zhes brjod ce na /
translated: Because the term ‚Äúpart‚Äù is not used for the whole.

original: de ni ma yin te /üîΩgzhan gyi nyes pa gzhan dag la //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te / gzhan gyi nyes pa gzhan dag la //
translated: That is not so.üîΩHow can one who has the fault ofüîΩeating the karkata fruit

original: ci lta bur na skud par byed //
analyzed: ci lta bur na skud par byed //
translated: cut off the nose of another?

original: 'di dag thams cad ma rung pa'i //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ma rung pa'i //
translated: All of this is the fault of the

original: bdag nyid 'chad pa po yi skyon //
analyzed: bdag nyid 'chad pa po yi skyon //
translated: expounder himself.

original: gzhan gyis kar ka ti ka zos pas gzhan gyi sna gcod par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyis kar ka ti ka zos pas gzhan gyi sna gcod par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that one who has eaten the karkata fruit cuts off the nose of another.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi tshogs pa ni phyogs yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can gyi tshogs pa ni phyogs yin no //
translated: The collection of subjects that are to be established is the position.

original: de la gal te de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya ba'i @205b phyir bshad na ni de'i tshe chos can yang de'i cha nyid pas de khyab pa yin par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de la gal te de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya ba'i @205b phyir bshad na ni de'i tshe chos can yang de'i cha nyid pas de khyab pa yin par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: If it is explained that ‚Äúit is pervaded by that factor,‚Äù then at that time, since the subject is also just that factor, it would be pervaded by it.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyis khyab pa mtshon par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyis khyab pa mtshon par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore the subject to be established would not be indicated as being pervaded by it.

original: des na de'i cha ni de'i chos yin gyi zhes smos so //
analyzed: des na de'i cha ni de'i chos yin gyi zhes smos so //
translated: Therefore it says, ‚ÄúThat factor is a property of that.‚Äù

original: cha'i sgra spyir rjod par byed pa yin yang /
analyzed: cha'i sgra spyir rjod par byed pa yin yang /
translated: Although the term ‚Äúfactor‚Äù is used generally,

original: smra ba po'i bsam pa'i dbang gis chos nyid cha yin par gzung ste /
analyzed: smra ba po'i bsam pa'i dbang gis chos nyid cha yin par gzung ste /
translated: due to the power of the speaker‚Äôs thought, the property itself is taken to be the factor.

original: phyogs kyi chos ni gzhan chos can gyi khyab par mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos ni gzhan chos can gyi khyab par mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the property of the position is not established as pervading the other subject.

original: de'i phyogs gcig ni ma yin te zhes bya ba 'di'i don ni /
analyzed: de'i phyogs gcig ni ma yin te zhes bya ba 'di'i don ni /
translated: It is not a part of it. The meaning of this is as follows.

original: phyogs gcig tsam ni ma yin te phyogs kyi sgra spyi brjod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs gcig tsam ni ma yin te phyogs kyi sgra spyi brjod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not merely a part, because the term ‚Äúpart‚Äù is not used to express a generality.

original: phyogs kyi sgras ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la the tshom za ba'i khyad par can gyi chos can brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi sgras ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la the tshom za ba'i khyad par can gyi chos can brjod pa yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúside‚Äù expresses the subject that is qualified by doubt about the property to be established.

original: des na phyogs kyi sgra ni spyi rjod par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na phyogs kyi sgra ni spyi rjod par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the word ‚Äúside‚Äù does not express a universal.

original: spyi'i don rtogs pa ni shugs kyis yin no //
analyzed: spyi'i don rtogs pa ni shugs kyis yin no //
translated: The understanding of the meaning of a universal is by implication.

original: chos can de'i cha ni shugs kyis de'i chos nyid do //
analyzed: chos can de'i cha ni shugs kyis de'i chos nyid do //
translated: The part of that subject is by implication the property of that subject.

original: de nyid ni de'i chos ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid ni de'i chos ma yin no //
translated: That is not the property of that.

original: gal te phyogs kyi sgras gtso bor mtshungs pa'i cha shas kyi dngos po spyi brjod pa yin na de'i tshe de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya ba chos can gyi mtshan nyid kyi chas khyab pa zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te phyogs kyi sgras gtso bor mtshungs pa'i cha shas kyi dngos po spyi brjod pa yin na de'i tshe de'i chas khyab pa zhes bya ba chos can gyi mtshan nyid kyi chas khyab pa zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If the word ‚Äúside‚Äù primarily expresses a universal that is a part of a similar instance, then at that time the definition of the subject, ‚Äúpervasion by a part of that,‚Äù would be ‚Äúpervasion by a part of the subject.‚Äù

original: de ltar ni 'dod pa can ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'dod pa can ma yin te /
translated: But that is not accepted.

original: des na de ltar 'chad pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de ltar 'chad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is explained in that way.

original: de'i phyir des ni 'gar yang mi srid pa'i phyir gzhan du 'gyur ba'i sgra gzhan brtags pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir des ni 'gar yang mi srid pa'i phyir gzhan du 'gyur ba'i sgra gzhan brtags pa med do //
translated: Therefore, because it is impossible in any way, the word ‚Äúother‚Äù does not designate another.

original: gzhan yang 'di ni brjod pa 'dod pa rjes su gnang ba zhes bya ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di ni brjod pa 'dod pa rjes su gnang ba zhes bya ba tshar gcad pa'i gnas yin no //
translated: Moreover, this is the occasion for the refutation called ‚Äúthe allowance of the desire to speak.‚Äù

original: rang gi phyogs kyi nyes pa ma spangs par gzhan gyi phyogs kyi skyon brjod pa ni /
analyzed: rang gi phyogs kyi nyes pa ma spangs par gzhan gyi phyogs kyi skyon brjod pa ni /
translated: The statement of the fault of the opponent‚Äôs position without abandoning the fault of one‚Äôs own position

original: 'dod pa'i rjes su snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rjes su snang ba'o //
translated: is the appearance of the desire.

original: yang ni ded la ni dgos pa yod pa yin te /
analyzed: yang ni ded la ni dgos pa yod pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, there is a purpose in the statement of the probandum,

original: nye bar btags su rung ba'i chos can yin par gzung ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar btags su rung ba'i chos can yin par gzung ba'o //
translated: because it is the apprehension of the property possessor that is suitable to be designated.

original: khyed la ni de lta ma yin pa'i phyir nye bar btags par mi rigs so //
analyzed: khyed la ni de lta ma yin pa'i phyir nye bar btags par mi rigs so //
translated: But since it is not like that for you, it is not suitable to be designated.

original: dngos srid gzhan du nye bar btags par rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos srid gzhan du nye bar btags par rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that the existence of the property is realized through designation elsewhere.

original: gzhan yang bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni phyogs so zhes bya ba 'dir sngar nges par gzung bar 'gyur ram//
analyzed: gzhan yang bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni phyogs so zhes bya ba 'dir sngar nges par gzung bar 'gyur ram//
translated: Moreover, in the statement ‚Äúthe position is the statement of the probandum,‚Äù is it ascertained earlier

original: 'on te phyis nges par gzung /
analyzed: 'on te phyis nges par gzung /
translated: or later?

original: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa nyid dam bca' ba yin gyi sgrub par byed pa bstan pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa nyid dam bca' ba yin gyi sgrub par byed pa bstan pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The statement of the probandum is the thesis, but the statement of the proof is not.

original: yang na bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bca' ba nyid yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: yang na bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bca' ba nyid yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur /
translated: Or else, the statement of the probandum is the thesis, but not the other.

original: de la / de sngar des @206a * //
analyzed: de la / de sngar des @206a * //
translated: If it is held that the thesis is stated first,

original: gzung don med 'dir //
analyzed: gzung don med 'dir //
translated: then it is pointless,üîΩbut if it is held that it is stated later,

original: phyi nges bzung na mi 'dong 'gyur //üîΩgang gal te sngar nges par bzung na ni don med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyi nges bzung na mi 'dong 'gyur // gang gal te sngar nges par bzung na ni don med par 'gyur te /
translated: then it is not the thesis.

original: des bzlog par bya ba gtan tshigs bstan pa dam bca' ba nyid yin pa ni khyad par sgrub par byed pa gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang dpe'i mtshan nyid kyis bkag pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: des bzlog par bya ba gtan tshigs bstan pa dam bca' ba nyid yin pa ni khyad par sgrub par byed pa gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang dpe'i mtshan nyid kyis bkag pa'i phyir te /
translated: If it is held that the thesis is stated first, then it is pointless, because the statement of the reason that is to be stated later would be the thesis, because it is refuted by the definition of the reason that proves a specific property and by the definition of the example.

original: dmigs kyis gzung ba'i yul bsngom ste /
analyzed: dmigs kyis gzung ba'i yul bsngom ste /
translated: The reason is stated in order to specify the object that is the general topic.

original: spyir btang pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyir btang pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the general topic is engaged.

original: phyis nges par 'dzin na ni /
analyzed: phyis nges par 'dzin na ni /
translated: But if it is held that it is stated later,

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i gtan tshigs dang / dpe bstan pa yang dam bca' ba nyid du 'gyur bas mi 'dod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i gtan tshigs dang / dpe bstan pa yang dam bca' ba nyid du 'gyur bas mi 'dod par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the statement of the reason and the example that are the probandum would be the thesis, and that is unacceptable.

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba nyid bstan pa dam bca' ba yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba nyid bstan pa dam bca' ba yin gyi /
translated: If the statement of the probandum is the thesis,üîΩthen the statement of the reason and the example would not be the thesis.

original: grub pa bstan pa ni ma yin no zhes par bzung na skyon ci yod /
analyzed: grub pa bstan pa ni ma yin no zhes par bzung na skyon ci yod /
translated: If you accept that, then what is the fault?

original: de ni sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa dag gis 'phangs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ni sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa dag gis 'phangs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: It is not that the reason, etc., are not stated.

original: de la 'di skad brjod de /üîΩsgrub byed bstan pa'i shugs nyid las //
analyzed: de la 'di skad brjod de / sgrub byed bstan pa'i shugs nyid las //
translated: To this we reply:üîΩThe meaning of the probandum is understood

original: don de bsgrub bya nyid du rtogs //
analyzed: don de bsgrub bya nyid du rtogs //
translated: merely from the force of the statement of the proof.

original: sgrub par byed pa thams cad ni ma grub pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir nye bar len pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa thams cad ni ma grub pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir nye bar len pa yin no //
translated: Since all proofs are for the purpose of proving what has not yet been proven, they are appropriated.üîΩIf it is proven, what is the use of a proof? Therefore, the meaning of the probandum is understood merely from the force of the statement of the definition of proof.

original: grub na sgrub par byed pas ci zhig bya des na sgrub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'i shugs nyid kyis ma grub pa'i don bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa nyid las grub pa la thal bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: grub na sgrub par byed pas ci zhig bya des na sgrub par byed pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'i shugs nyid kyis ma grub pa'i don bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa nyid las grub pa la thal bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: It is not the case that the probandum is proven by the statement of the definition of proof, because the probandum is not proven by the statement of the definition of proof.

original: bzlog pa'i don du ni nges par bzung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i don du ni nges par bzung ba ma yin no //
translated: The meaning of the opposite is not ascertained.

original: gtan tshigs sogs mtshan gyis khyab phyir //
analyzed: gtan tshigs sogs mtshan gyis khyab phyir //
translated: Since the reason, etc., are pervaded by the characteristics,

original: sgrub par byed pa dogs pa'ang med //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa dogs pa'ang med //
translated: there is no doubt about the proof.

original: 'di snyam du bsgrub bya nyid du bstan pa dam bca' ba zhes pa ngar nges par gzung bas na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du bsgrub bya nyid du bstan pa dam bca' ba zhes pa ngar nges par gzung bas na /
translated: One might think, The statement 'the thesis is what is to be established' is a definite indication of the term 'thesis.'

original: sgra'i bya ba la ltos te ma sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa gsal ba'i don yin te /
analyzed: sgra'i bya ba la ltos te ma sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa gsal ba'i don yin te /
translated: Therefore, in terms of the function of the word, it is indicated as what is to be established.

original: sgrub par byed pas ni der nus pa ma yin no snyam na 'di la bshad pa /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pas ni der nus pa ma yin no snyam na 'di la bshad pa /
translated: But if one thinks, It is not indicated as what establishes, then the response to this is as follows.

original: gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis khyab pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa la ni dgos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis khyab pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa la ni dgos pa ma yin no //
translated: Since it is pervaded by the definition of a reason and so on, it is not necessary to indicate it as what establishes.üîΩJust as in terms of the function of the word, what is to be established is indicated as what establishes, it is also indicated as what is to be established by the statement what is to be established.

original: ci ltar sgra'i byed pa la ltos te ma grub pa sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid kho nar bstan pa zhes bya bas spangs pa de bzhin du dpe brjod pa'i shugs kyis bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs so
analyzed: ci ltar sgra'i byed pa la ltos te ma grub pa sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid kho nar bstan pa zhes bya bas spangs pa de bzhin du dpe brjod pa'i shugs kyis bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs so
translated: In the same way, the definition of a reason is that which establishes the probandum by the power of stating the example.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis /
translated: And so on.

original: bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi tshul gyis yin la @206b dpe yang de bzhin no zhes bshad par nus pa'i phyir na gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i tshan nyid kyis khyab par yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi tshul gyis yin la @206b dpe yang de bzhin no zhes bshad par nus pa'i phyir na gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i tshan nyid kyis khyab par yin no //
translated: The reason is called that which proves the probandum, because it is the means of proving the probandum, and the example is like that.

original: sngar nges bzung na de yis ni //
analyzed: sngar nges bzung na de yis ni //
translated: If it is ascertained earlier, then stating it

original: dam bca'i mtshan nyid brjod don med //üîΩde phyir shugs kyis de brjod pa //
analyzed: dam bca'i mtshan nyid brjod don med // de phyir shugs kyis de brjod pa //
translated: has no purpose as a thesis.üîΩTherefore, it is understood that it is pervasion

original: khyab pa'i 'bras can yin par rtogs //
analyzed: khyab pa'i 'bras can yin par rtogs //
translated: that is stated implicitly.

original: sngar nges par bzung na don med par 'gyur bas na /
analyzed: sngar nges par bzung na don med par 'gyur bas na /
translated: If it is ascertained earlier, then stating it has no purpose.

original: 'os med par phyi mar nges par gzung ba yin la de yang khyab pa'i 'bras bu can yin no //
analyzed: 'os med par phyi mar nges par gzung ba yin la de yang khyab pa'i 'bras bu can yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is ascertained later without any choice, and that is pervasion.

original: 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bca' ba kho na'o zhes bya bas gal te mtshan nyid gzhan gyis khyab pa nyid yin pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bca' ba kho na'o zhes bya bas gal te mtshan nyid gzhan gyis khyab pa nyid yin pa de lta na yang /
translated: Thus, the statement of the probandum is only a thesis. If it is pervaded by another characteristic, then

original: dam bca' ba kho na yin gyi dam bca' ba ma yin pa ni ma yin no zhes ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa dag gis 'bras bur 'gyur ba'i phyir sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni dam bca' ba yin no zhes bya ba dag giüîΩdon du 'gyur te /
analyzed: dam bca' ba kho na yin gyi dam bca' ba ma yin pa ni ma yin no zhes ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod pa dag gis 'bras bur 'gyur ba'i phyir sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni dam bca' ba yin no zhes bya ba dag gi don du 'gyur te /
translated: Proof is that which proves, because it is the cause of the establishment of the thesis.

original: gzhan du don med do //
analyzed: gzhan du don med do //
translated: Otherwise, it would be meaningless.

original: gal te rang nyid kyis brjod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te rang nyid kyis brjod pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it stated by ourselves?

original: de ltar yang ;
analyzed: de ltar yang ;
translated: And so:

original: dpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub smra //
analyzed: dpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub smra //
translated: The statement of the example and reason is not established,

original: dam bca' bar ni thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dam bca' bar ni thal bar 'gyur //
translated: and it follows that there is a thesis.

original: zhes bya ba la gzhan gyi gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid la sogs pas khyab pas lan btab pa na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la gzhan gyi gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid la sogs pas khyab pas lan btab pa na /
translated: When the opponent replies to the statement of the definition of reason, etc.,

original: sngar ma grub pa'i rang bzhin phyir //üîΩzhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: sngar ma grub pa'i rang bzhin phyir // zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du /
translated: with ‚Äúbecause the nature of the reason is not established,‚Äù

original: thams cad rnam 'gas ma grub phyir//
analyzed: thams cad rnam 'gas ma grub phyir//
translated: and similarly, with ‚Äúbecause everything is not established in any way,‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan du brjod pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan du brjod pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: and so on, then we reply, ‚Äúthat is not so.‚Äù

original: skyon 'di ni med de /
analyzed: skyon 'di ni med de /
translated: This fault does not exist.

original: 'dis ni phan tshun 'gal ba yin //
analyzed: 'dis ni phan tshun 'gal ba yin //
translated: This is mutually contradictory.

original: de ltar thal bar 'gyur ba nyid //üîΩde byed rang gi 'dod pa ni //
analyzed: de ltar thal bar 'gyur ba nyid // de byed rang gi 'dod pa ni //
translated: Thus, it follows thatüîΩyour own assertion does not

original: rab tu sgrub par byed ma yin //
analyzed: rab tu sgrub par byed ma yin //
translated: establish the thesis.

original: 'di ni phan tshun 'gal ba ston pa tsam du zad kyi /
analyzed: 'di ni phan tshun 'gal ba ston pa tsam du zad kyi /
translated: This is merely the demonstration of mutual contradiction.

original: gtan tshigs 'dis bsgrub par bya ba'i don bsgrub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs 'dis bsgrub par bya ba'i don bsgrub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: This reason does not establish the meaning of the thesis.

original: phan tshun 'gal ba tsam ni 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun 'gal ba tsam ni 'dod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the mere contradiction is intended.

original: des na 'di ni phyis nges par gzung ba nyid do //
analyzed: des na 'di ni phyis nges par gzung ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, this is definitely grasped later.

original: de lta yin dang ma 'brel pa'i rnam par bcad pa'i phyir ji snyed dam bca' ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba de thams cad sel bar byed pa yin te ;
analyzed: de lta yin dang ma 'brel pa'i rnam par bcad pa'i phyir ji snyed dam bca' ba nyid du mi 'gyur ba de thams cad sel bar byed pa yin te ;
translated: If that is so, because of the exclusion of non-connection, how could it not be a thesis? It excludes everything.

original: dam bca' ba kho na'i dam ba'i ba mao yin pa ni ma yin no zhes sgrub par byed pa nyid kyis dam bca' ba ma yin pa de yang sel to //
analyzed: dam bca' ba kho na'i dam ba'i ba mao yin pa ni ma yin no zhes sgrub par byed pa nyid kyis dam bca' ba ma yin pa de yang sel to //
translated: Because it is not just the thesis itself that is the object of affirmation, it also excludes what is not an affirmation.

original: re zhig phyogs kyi mtshan nyid gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: re zhig phyogs kyi mtshan nyid gsal ba yin no //
translated: Thus, the characteristic of the position has been clarified.

original: da ni phyogs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid gsal ba'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: da ni phyogs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid gsal ba'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: Now, in order to clarify the characteristic of the semblance of a position, it is said:

original: gtan tshigs dam bca' @207a * //üîΩ'gal ba ni //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dam bca' @207a * // 'gal ba ni //
translated: The reason is contradictory.üîΩüîΩ

original: dam bca'i skyon zhes pa ru min //
analyzed: dam bca'i skyon zhes pa ru min //
translated: The contradiction of the thesis and reason is not a fault of the thesis.

original: de nyid dpe nyid ma sbyangs dag / chos mi mthun pas brjod pa yin //
analyzed: de nyid dpe nyid ma sbyangs dag / chos mi mthun pas brjod pa yin //
translated: The thesis is stated by a reason that is not established by a similar example,üîΩbut is expressed by an example that is dissimilar.

original: gang dag ji skad du dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba ni dam bca' ba 'gal ba ste /
analyzed: gang dag ji skad du dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba ni dam bca' ba 'gal ba ste /
translated: The contradiction of the thesis and reason is when the thesis and reason contradict each other.

original: dper na sgra rtag ste thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba bzhin te /
analyzed: dper na sgra rtag ste thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba bzhin te /
translated: For example, it is like saying, ‚ÄúSound is permanent because everything is impermanent.‚Äù

original: sgra rtag pa zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba'o //
analyzed: sgra rtag pa zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSound is permanent‚Äù is the thesis.

original: thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause everything is impermanent‚Äù is the reason.

original: gal te thams cad mi rtag pa yin na sgra rtag par ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te thams cad mi rtag pa yin na sgra rtag par ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: If everything is impermanent, how can sound be permanent?

original: sgra med na ni thams cad du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra med na ni thams cad du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If there is no sound, it cannot be everything.

original: 'on te sgra yang mi rtag na de ltar sgra rtag pa yin zhes bya ba smras pa /
analyzed: 'on te sgra yang mi rtag na de ltar sgra rtag pa yin zhes bya ba smras pa /
translated: But if sound is also impermanent, then how can it be said that sound is permanent?

original: de la smras pa 'di ni dam bca'i ba'i skyon ma yin te /
analyzed: de la smras pa 'di ni dam bca'i ba'i skyon ma yin te /
translated: To that, we reply that this is not a fault of the thesis.

original: 'di ltar / 'gal ba 'dod dang 'brel med de //
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'gal ba 'dod dang 'brel med de //
translated: There is no contradiction with what is not related,

original: phan med lhan cig gnas pa min //üîΩde lta na na ni rtags kyi skyon //
analyzed: phan med lhan cig gnas pa min // de lta na na ni rtags kyi skyon //
translated: and there is no useless simultaneous occurrence.üîΩIf that were so, then all

original: thams cad dam ba'i skyon du 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad dam ba'i skyon du 'gyur //
translated: the faults of the reason would be faults of the thesis.

original: dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs dag 'gal ba yin na 'gal ba zhes bya ba'i dam bca'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs dag 'gal ba yin na 'gal ba zhes bya ba'i dam bca'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: If the thesis and the reason are contradictory, then there is the fault of contradiction, which is a fault of the thesis.

original: 'gal ba de yang 'dod pa dang ma 'brel ba yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba de yang 'dod pa dang ma 'brel ba yin no //
translated: That contradiction is not related to what is asserted.

original: 'dod pa dang ma 'brel pa de yang phan ba med pa dang / lhan cig tu yang gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang ma 'brel pa de yang phan ba med pa dang / lhan cig tu yang gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: That which is not related to what is asserted is also useless and does not occur simultaneously.

original: gal te gtan tshig skyon dang ldan pa'i phyir don de la phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa de tsam gyis bsgrub par bya ba dang / 'gal ba ni de'i tshe rtags kyi skyon thams cad dam bca' ba'i skyon du thal ba nyid na 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshig skyon dang ldan pa'i phyir don de la phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa de tsam gyis bsgrub par bya ba dang / 'gal ba ni de'i tshe rtags kyi skyon thams cad dam bca' ba'i skyon du thal ba nyid na 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
translated: If the reason is faulty and therefore does not assist the meaning, and merely that is contradictory to the probandum, then it follows that all the faults of the reason would be faults of the thesis. But that is not so.

original: gang gi phyir /üîΩphyogs skyon gzhan la ltos pa ni //
analyzed: gang gi phyir / phyogs skyon gzhan la ltos pa ni //
translated: Because:üîΩIt has been explained that

original: ma yin zhes kyang bstan zin to //
analyzed: ma yin zhes kyang bstan zin to //
translated: the position does not depend on other faults.

original: gal te gzhan yang ltos pa yang phyogs kyi nyes pa yin na de'i tshe 'ga' yang sgrub par byed pa'i skyon nyid yin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te gzhan yang ltos pa yang phyogs kyi nyes pa yin na de'i tshe 'ga' yang sgrub par byed pa'i skyon nyid yin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If the fault of the thesis is also a fault of the proof, then at that time, no fault of the proof would be possible.

original: dam bca'i don la gnod pas dam bca' ba'i skyon gyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dam bca'i don la gnod pas dam bca' ba'i skyon gyi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the meaning of the thesis is harmed, it is included in the fault of the thesis.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i skyon rnams logs su mi smos pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i skyon rnams logs su mi smos pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The faults of the proof would not be mentioned separately.

original: sems rmongs pa med pas su zhig gcig gi nang du 'dus bzhin du logs shig tu brjod /
analyzed: sems rmongs pa med pas su zhig gcig gi nang du 'dus bzhin du logs shig tu brjod /
translated: Since the mind is not confused, who would mention separately what is included in one?

original: de'i phyir 'di lta bu ni phyogs kyi nyes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di lta bu ni phyogs kyi nyes pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is not a fault of the thesis.

original: 'on te lhan cig mi gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'gal ba yin na de'i tshe /üîΩ'dod la med na 'ang ma grub yin /
analyzed: 'on te lhan cig mi gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyis 'gal ba yin na de'i tshe / 'dod la med na 'ang ma grub yin /
translated: But if it is contradictory by nature, not coexisting, then at that time,

original: gal te gtan tshigs 'dod pa'i phyogs la @207b med na de'i tshe ma grub pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs 'dod pa'i phyogs la @207b med na de'i tshe ma grub pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If the reason does not exist in the position of the thesis, then at that time, it is not established.

original: ma grub pa nyid kyis de bzlog par 'gyur kyi dam bca' ba'i nyes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ma grub pa nyid kyis de bzlog par 'gyur kyi dam bca' ba'i nyes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Because it is not established, it is refuted by that, but it is not a fault of the thesis.

original: ci ste des dam bca' ba'i don zlog par byed pa de lta yin na /
analyzed: ci ste des dam bca' ba'i don zlog par byed pa de lta yin na /
translated: If the opponent does refute the meaning of the thesis,

original: tshad ma gang gis de bsgrub pa tshad ma des dam bcas pa gsal ba'i skyon du 'gyur gyis /
analyzed: tshad ma gang gis de bsgrub pa tshad ma des dam bcas pa gsal ba'i skyon du 'gyur gyis /
translated: then the proof of that by a means of valid knowledge would be a fault of the thesis being stated.

original: 'gal ba zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //üîΩmi rtag gtan tshigs dang ldan pas //
analyzed: 'gal ba zhes bya ba ni ma yin no // mi rtag gtan tshigs dang ldan pas //
translated: But it is not called a contradiction.üîΩIf one states sound as impermanent

original: sgra la de ltar rjod byed na //
analyzed: sgra la de ltar rjod byed na //
translated: by means of a reason,

original: de ltar de ni bzlog par 'gyur //
analyzed: de ltar de ni bzlog par 'gyur //
translated: then it is refuted in that way.

original: gal te mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs dan ldan na ni //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs dan ldan na ni //
translated: If one states sound as impermanent by means of a reason,

original: sgra la de ltar rab tu brjod pa yin na /
analyzed: sgra la de ltar rab tu brjod pa yin na /
translated: then one states sound in that way.

original: gang gi phyir 'di la dpe bstan pa nyid las /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di la dpe bstan pa nyid las /
translated: But in this case, the example itself shows that

original: don gzhan ci zhig mthong ba yong  //
analyzed: don gzhan ci zhig mthong ba yong  //
translated: what other object is seen?

original: 'di gtan tshigs bstan pa ni 'on kyang chos mi mthun pa'i dpe yin no //üîΩsgra rtag ste thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dir yang 'di skad du sgra ni rtag ste /
analyzed: 'di gtan tshigs bstan pa ni 'on kyang chos mi mthun pa'i dpe yin no // sgra rtag ste thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dir yang 'di skad du sgra ni rtag ste /
translated: The statement of the reason is still a dissimilar example.

original: mi rtag pa ni thams cad yin pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa ni thams cad yin pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: In the case of ‚ÄúSound is permanent because all are impermanent,‚Äù one should say, ‚ÄúSound is permanent because all are impermanent.‚Äù

original: ma sbyangs pa'i phyir de skad ni ma brjod do //
analyzed: ma sbyangs pa'i phyir de skad ni ma brjod do //
translated: But because it is not yet refined, it is not stated.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: And so:üîΩThat is just an analogy, not yet refined,

original: de ni dpe nyid ma sbyangs dag / chos mi mthun pas brjod pa yin //üîΩzhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni dpe nyid ma sbyangs dag / chos mi mthun pas brjod pa yin // zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: stated by means of a dissimilar property.

original: 'di la ni dpe bshad pa las gzhan ni mthong ba med do //
analyzed: 'di la ni dpe bshad pa las gzhan ni mthong ba med do //
translated: Here, there is no other explanation of the example than what is seen.

original: de gnyi ga las she na /
analyzed: de gnyi ga las she na /
translated: How are both of those?

original: 'di ltar gal te sgra nyid la mi rtag pa nyid ston pa yin na /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te sgra nyid la mi rtag pa nyid ston pa yin na /
translated: Thus, if impermanence is taught in sound itself,üîΩthen it would be a reason, but that is not tenable.

original: de lta na 'di gtan tshigs su 'gyur pa yin na de ltar ni mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de lta na 'di gtan tshigs su 'gyur pa yin na de ltar ni mi 'thad de /
translated: Because:

original: 'di ltar / khyad par la ni gzhan brjod nas //üîΩspyi ni rjes su 'jug pas na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / khyad par la ni gzhan brjod nas // spyi ni rjes su 'jug pas na //
translated: Having stated the other in the particular,üîΩthe general is included.

original: de khyab ma yin spyi rjes su //
analyzed: de khyab ma yin spyi rjes su //
translated: The general is not pervaded,

original: 'jug la 'bras bu'ang ci zhig yod //
analyzed: 'jug la 'bras bu'ang ci zhig yod //
translated: and what is the result of inclusion?

original: sbyor ba thams cad ni sgra las byung ba'i rigs pa'i rjes su 'brang bas rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba thams cad ni sgra las byung ba'i rigs pa'i rjes su 'brang bas rtogs pa yin no //
translated: All syllogisms are understood by following the reasoning that arises from sound.

original: sgra las byung pa'i rigs pa yang sgrub pa dang dgag pa dang nges pa'o //
analyzed: sgra las byung pa'i rigs pa yang sgrub pa dang dgag pa dang nges pa'o //
translated: The reasoning that arises from sound is affirmation, negation, and ascertainment.

original: bsgrub pa yang gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub pa yang gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa'o //
translated: The probandum is the object of refutation and the means of refutation.

original: nges pa yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: nges pa yang de bzhin no //
translated: The same applies to the refutable and the refuting.

original: de la gnod par bya ba dang / gnod par byed pa'i dngos po ni spyi dang khyad par bsgrub pa dag go //üîΩde ltar res 'ga' ni sngar gnod par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: de la gnod par bya ba dang / gnod par byed pa'i dngos po ni spyi dang khyad par bsgrub pa dag go // de ltar res 'ga' ni sngar gnod par bya ba yin la /
translated: The object of refutation and the means of refutation are the universal and the particular, respectively.

original: res 'ga' ni gnod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: res 'ga' ni gnod par byed pa yin no //
translated: Sometimes the universal is the object of refutation and the particular is the means of refutation.üîΩSometimes the particular is the object of refutation and the universal is the means of refutation.

original: rnam pa thams cad du khyad par ni gnod par byed pa yin la /üîΩspyi ni gnod par bya ba yin no zhes gnas te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du khyad par ni gnod par byed pa yin la / spyi ni gnod par bya ba yin no zhes gnas te /
translated: In every case, the particular is the means of refutation and the universal is the object of refutation.

original: tha snyad ni de lta bu nyid du mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad ni de lta bu nyid du mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the case because we see that the universal is the object of refutation and the particular is the means of refutation.

original: 'di la yang sgra rtag pa yin no zhes bya bar sgra la rtag pa nyid kyi khyad par gzhan bsgrubs @208a * //üîΩpa yin la /
analyzed: 'di la yang sgra rtag pa yin no zhes bya bar sgra la rtag pa nyid kyi khyad par gzhan bsgrubs @208a * // pa yin la /
translated: Here, when one says, ‚ÄúSound is permanent,‚Äù one is proving the particular quality of permanence in sound.

original: mi rtag pa nyid ni spyi'i chos na la bsgrubs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid ni spyi'i chos na la bsgrubs pa'i phyir /
translated: When one says, ‚ÄúSound is impermanent,‚Äù one is proving the universal quality of impermanence in sound.

original: gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa'i dngos po 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa'i dngos po 'thad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the object of refutation and the means of refutation are tenable.
