analyzed: tshad ma ma yin pa las ni nges pa ma yin te /
translated: If it is not ascertained by a valid cognition, it is not ascertained.

original: tshad ma don med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma don med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that valid cognition would be pointless.

original: 'on te de'i tshe rjes su dpag pas yan lag gzhan nges pa la /
analyzed: 'on te de'i tshe rjes su dpag pas yan lag gzhan nges pa la /
translated: But if at that time the other parts are ascertained by inference,

original: ngo shes pas gcig tu rtogs pa'i phyir yan lag can rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: ngo shes pas gcig tu rtogs pa'i phyir yan lag can rtogs pa yin te /
translated: then the whole is cognized because it is cognized as one by recognition.

original: yan lag dag ni yan lag gzhan dag dang gcig pa nyid ma yin la /
analyzed: yan lag dag ni yan lag gzhan dag dang gcig pa nyid ma yin la /
translated: The parts are not the same as the other parts,

original: yon tan yang yon tan gzhan dang cig shos ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yon tan yang yon tan gzhan dang cig shos ma yin no zhe na /
translated: and the qualities are not the same as the other qualities.

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is also illogical.

original: rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir mngon sum gyis de 'ba' zhig pa nyid du rtogs pa ji lta bar 'gyur ba de lta bur gyur pa @219a * //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir mngon sum gyis de 'ba' zhig pa nyid du rtogs pa ji lta bar 'gyur ba de lta bur gyur pa @219a * //
translated: Because inference is preceded by direct perception, it is just like direct perception cognizing it as only that.

original: nyid rjes su dpag pas rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: nyid rjes su dpag pas rtogs par byed do //
translated: Inference causes the ascertainment of just that.

original: des na 'ba' zhig pa tha dad par gyur pa mngon sum gyis rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pas kyang de lta bur gyur pa nyid rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na 'ba' zhig pa tha dad par gyur pa mngon sum gyis rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pas kyang de lta bur gyur pa nyid rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, because direct perception cognizes the difference of the parts, inference also cognizes it as just that.

original: de'i phyir gzhan du yang mngon sum gyis mthong ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzhan du yang mngon sum gyis mthong ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is seen by direct perception in other cases as well.

original: dngos po gcig tu ngo shes las //
analyzed: dngos po gcig tu ngo shes las //
translated: From the recognition of a single entity,

original: ji ltar gzhan du rtogs pa yis //
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan du rtogs pa yis //
translated: how can there be the cognition of another?

original: lam du mod la byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: lam du mod la byed par 'gyur //
translated: How can there be the production of an effect on the path?

original: mngon sum gyis rnam pa gzhan du rtogs pa ni ngo shes pas stong gis kyang gzhan du rtogs par bya nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis rnam pa gzhan du rtogs pa ni ngo shes pas stong gis kyang gzhan du rtogs par bya nus pa ma yin no //
translated: The cognition of another aspect by direct perception is empty of recognition. It is not possible to cognize another by recognition.

original: ngo shes pa yang mngon sum nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: ngo shes pa yang mngon sum nyid do zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that recognition is itself direct perception,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i yul la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i yul la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it engages the object of inference.

original: rjes su dpag pa de yang du ma'i yul can yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa de yang du ma'i yul can yin no //
translated: And that inference has a manifold object.

original: ngo shes pa ji ltar tha snyad kyi rgyu yin zhe na /üîΩtshad ma nyid kyis zhes brjod do //
analyzed: ngo shes pa ji ltar tha snyad kyi rgyu yin zhe na / tshad ma nyid kyis zhes brjod do //
translated: How is recognition the cause of convention?üîΩIt is said to be valid cognition.

original: tshad ma yin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: tshad ma yin no zhes brjod do //
translated: It is said to be valid cognition.

original: tshad ma nyid kyang rjes su dpag pa yin pas so //
analyzed: tshad ma nyid kyang rjes su dpag pa yin pas so //
translated: Because validity itself is inference.

original: 'o na de gcig pa nyid rjes su dpag pa nyid kyis yin te des yan lag can bden pa la brten par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'o na de gcig pa nyid rjes su dpag pa nyid kyis yin te des yan lag can bden pa la brten par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: If so, it is just inference of oneness, because the possessor of parts would be based on truth.

original: nged kyi phyogs grub po zhe na /
analyzed: nged kyi phyogs grub po zhe na /
translated: If you say that our position is established,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: no, it is not.

original: don dam pa'i gcig pa nyid grub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa'i gcig pa nyid grub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not establish ultimate identity.

original: don de byed pa nyid kyis de la gcig pa nyid yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don de byed pa nyid kyis de la gcig pa nyid yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no //
translated: It is identity in that it performs the same function, not ultimately.

original: de nyid kyi don bya ba byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i nges pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi don bya ba byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i nges pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there any certainty that it will perform the function of that object,

original: me gzhan gyis kyang sreg par byed pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me gzhan gyis kyang sreg par byed pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because we see that fire burns other things as well.

original: dngos po med pa'i phyir ji ltar nye bar btags pa las gcig nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i phyir ji ltar nye bar btags pa las gcig nyid yin zhe na /
translated: How can there be identity from mere designation, since there is no real entity?

original: thog ma med pa'i bag chags las nye bar btags pa brgyud pa yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i bag chags las nye bar btags pa brgyud pa yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: There is no fault, because the designation is a continuum arising from beginningless habitual tendencies.

original: yang na dang po mthong ba ni dngos kyi gcig yin par brjod la ;
analyzed: yang na dang po mthong ba ni dngos kyi gcig yin par brjod la ;
translated: Or, the first perception is said to be the real identity,

original: phyis ni der sgro btags pa las don bya bas byas pa nye bar btags pa yin no //
analyzed: phyis ni der sgro btags pa las don bya bas byas pa nye bar btags pa yin no //
translated: and later, from the superimposition of that, the function is designated as performed.

original: de'i phyir ldog pa kun brtags pa las chos dang chos can dag de nyid dang gzhan nyid du 'gyur ba yin gyi dngos po la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ldog pa kun brtags pa las chos dang chos can dag de nyid dang gzhan nyid du 'gyur ba yin gyi dngos po la ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the property and the subject are the same or different only in terms of the conceptual distinction, not in terms of the thing itself.

original: des na tha dad pa ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na tha dad pa ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, they are not different.

original: tha dad pa ni blos btags pa'i dbye ba las yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa ni blos btags pa'i dbye ba las yin no //
translated: The difference is a conceptual distinction.

original: dbye ba de ni mngon sum las ma yin te /
analyzed: dbye ba de ni mngon sum las ma yin te /
translated: That distinction is not from direct perception,

original: de mngon du song ba can gyi rjes su dpag pa las kyang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de mngon du song ba can gyi rjes su dpag pa las kyang ma yin gyi /
translated: nor is it from inference that has the nature of going to the object.

original: 'on kyang thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyis byas pa'i rjes su dpag pa brgyud pa las byung ba yin pa'i phyir don dam pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyis byas pa'i rjes su dpag pa brgyud pa las byung ba yin pa'i phyir don dam pa ma yin no //
translated: However, it is not ultimate because it arises from a continuum of inference created by beginningless latent propensities.

translated: Because they have different contradistinctions, if they were not different, there would be the fault that the property to be proven and the proof would not be different. Therefore, because the particular and the universal have different contradistinctions,

translated: The relation is a part of the probandum, but there is no contradiction.

original: des na bsgrub bya'i dus na yan lag yin yang chos can gyi khyad par ni chos can tha dad pa las gtan tshigs yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na bsgrub bya'i dus na yan lag yin yang chos can gyi khyad par ni chos can tha dad pa las gtan tshigs yin pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, even though it is a part at the time of the probandum, the particular of the subject is the reason from the difference of the subject.

original: yang na de rtogs nas ldog phyir //
analyzed: yang na de rtogs nas ldog phyir //
translated: Or, because of the reversal after understanding that.

original: yang na de rtogs nas ldog phyir //üîΩbsgrub bya'i dus su yan lag min //
analyzed: yang na de rtogs nas ldog phyir // bsgrub bya'i dus su yan lag min //
translated: Or, because of the reversal after understanding that,üîΩit is not a part at the time of the probandum.

original: khyad par ni gdon mi za bar bsgrub bya nyid yin par mtshon pa'i dus na yan lag tu 'gyur pa ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par ni gdon mi za bar bsgrub bya nyid yin par mtshon pa'i dus na yan lag tu 'gyur pa ma yin te /
translated: The particular is certainly the probandum, but it is not a part at the time of the illustration.

original: de nye bar mtshon nas snga nyid du log pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nye bar mtshon nas snga nyid du log pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is reversed before that, after the illustration.

original: dper na lhas byin gyi khyim gang yin zhes dris pa na /
analyzed: dper na lhas byin gyi khyim gang yin zhes dris pa na /
translated: For example, when asked, ‚ÄúWhat is Devadatta‚Äôs house?‚Äù

original: gang na bya rog sgra sgrogs pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gang na bya rog sgra sgrogs pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: one replies, ‚ÄúIt is where the crow caws.‚Äù

original: de lha khang la sogs pa nye bar mtshon nas da ltar log pa yin yang dus gzhan du yang de nye bar mtshon par byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de lha khang la sogs pa nye bar mtshon nas da ltar log pa yin yang dus gzhan du yang de nye bar mtshon par byed pa bzhin no //
translated: Even though the crow is not present at the time of the question, it is indicated by the house.

original: gal te med pa ji ltar nye bar mtshon pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te med pa ji ltar nye bar mtshon pa yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúHow can something nonexistent be indicated?‚Äù

original: de'i 'bras bu khyad par gyi mthar thug pa'i blo yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu khyad par gyi mthar thug pa'i blo yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because the cognition of the result of the crow exists at the time of the house.

original: de'i phyir nye bar mtshon pa ni dam bcas ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid kyis ma grub pa'i nyes pa la brten pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nye bar mtshon pa ni dam bcas ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid kyis ma grub pa'i nyes pa la brten pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the indication is not based on the fault of nonestablishment of just one part of the meaning of the thesis.

original: gal te chos can tha dad pa yin na spyi dang khyad par gyi dngos pos tha dad pa yod pa'i phyir dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs nyid yin pas ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon du 'gyur ba ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te chos can tha dad pa yin na spyi dang khyad par gyi dngos pos tha dad pa yod pa'i phyir dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs nyid yin pas ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon du 'gyur ba ma yin na /
translated: If the basis of the property is different, then because of the existence of difference by the nature of the general and the particular, it is just the basis of the thesis, and so the fault of nonestablishment does not arise.

original: 'o na chos can tha dad pa med pa nyid la skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'o na chos can tha dad pa med pa nyid la skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: But if the subject is not different, then there is a fault.

original: mnyan bya nyid la sogs pa yang dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid do zhes bya bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: mnyan bya nyid la sogs pa yang dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid do zhes bya bar 'gyur la /
translated: And the object of the thesis, such as being heard, would be only one part of the thesis.

original: khyab pa mtshungs pa'i byas pa nyid dang / mi rtag pa nyid kyang 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: khyab pa mtshungs pa'i byas pa nyid dang / mi rtag pa nyid kyang 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: And the pervasion would be the same as the reason, such as being produced or impermanent.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: 'di ltar / chos tha dad phyir khyad par yang //
analyzed: 'di ltar / chos tha dad phyir khyad par yang //
translated: Because the properties are different,

original: dam bca'i don du 'thad ma yin //üîΩrva can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad kyi /
analyzed: dam bca'i don du 'thad ma yin // rva can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad kyi /
translated: the distinction is not tenable as the object of the thesis.üîΩIt is not only in the case of horns that the distinction is not an uncommon property,

original: khyad par thun mong ma yin pa mnyan bya nyid la sogs pa yang 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par thun mong ma yin pa mnyan bya nyid la sogs pa yang 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: but also in the case of being heard and so on.

original: chos tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chos tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the properties are different.

original: gal te sgra ma yin pa nyid gang la ldog pas sgra nyid yin pa de tsam nyid kyis mnyan bya nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te sgra ma yin pa nyid gang la ldog pas sgra nyid yin pa de tsam nyid kyis mnyan bya nyid ma yin nam /
translated: If non-sound is the opposite of sound, is that alone not the object of hearing?

original: de skad du yang rna bas gzung ba'i mtshan nyid ni sgra'o zhes bshad pa yin no zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de skad du yang rna bas gzung ba'i mtshan nyid ni sgra'o zhes bshad pa yin no zhes bshad do //
translated: Thus, it is said that the characteristic of what is apprehended by the ear is sound.

original: des na ji ltar ldog pa'i tha dad pa med par chos dang chos can tha dad ce na /
analyzed: des na ji ltar ldog pa'i tha dad pa med par chos dang chos can tha dad ce na /
translated: How can the difference between a property and a property-possessor be established without a difference in the exclusion?

original: de ni mi rung ste /
analyzed: de ni mi rung ste /
translated: That is not correct.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: phan tshun nang du 'du na ni //
analyzed: phan tshun nang du 'du na ni //
translated: if they were mutually included,

original: chos tha dad par rigs @221b ldan min //
analyzed: chos tha dad par rigs @221b ldan min //
translated: the difference between properties would not be tenable.

original: don gzhan dang ni 'brel pa las //
analyzed: don gzhan dang ni 'brel pa las //
translated: But if they are related as different objects,

original: 'brel med pa ni tha dad yin //
analyzed: 'brel med pa ni tha dad yin //
translated: the difference is not without a relation.

original: mnyan bya nyid ni nyan pa'i rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir ma 'brel pa nyid las log pa yin la /
analyzed: mnyan bya nyid ni nyan pa'i rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir ma 'brel pa nyid las log pa yin la /
translated: Because audibility is related to the auditory consciousness, it is the opposite of non-relatedness.

original: sgra ni sgra ma yin pa'i phyir spyi nyid las ldog pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra ni sgra ma yin pa'i phyir spyi nyid las ldog pa yin no //
translated: But sound is the opposite of non-soundness, which is a universal.

original: gal te sgra mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa med pa de ltar na yang /
analyzed: gal te sgra mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa med pa de ltar na yang /
translated: Even if there were no non-audibility of sound,

original: tshogs pa med pa'i phyir skyes bu gzhan la ltos nas mnyan par bya ba ma yin par yang 'gyur la /
analyzed: tshogs pa med pa'i phyir skyes bu gzhan la ltos nas mnyan par bya ba ma yin par yang 'gyur la /
translated: it would still be non-audibility in relation to another person, because there is no collection.

original: sgra ma yin par ni skyes bu gzhan la ltos kyang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa las log pas ni sgra nyid ma yin no //üîΩmnyan bya nyid de ltar 'gyur gyi sgra nyid ni ma yin te /

translated: It is not sound because it is not sound.üîΩIt is not sound because it is not sound.üîΩIt is not sound because it is not sound.üîΩIt is not sound because it is not sound.üîΩIt is not sound because it is not sound.üîΩIt is not sound because it is not sound.üîΩIt is not sound because it is not sound.üîΩIt is not sound because it is not sound.üîΩIt is not sound because it is not sound.

translated: It is not sound because it is not sound.üîΩIt is not sound because it is not sound.

analyzed: dpe med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //üîΩ'on kyang mig la sogs pa dang / de'i phyogs gcig nyid yin no //
translated: It is not sound because it is not sound.üîΩIt is not sound because

original: ci ste yang sgra nyid thun mong ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yang sgra nyid thun mong ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if you think that the sound itself is not common,

original: de ltar ni brtag par mi nus te /
analyzed: de ltar ni brtag par mi nus te /
translated: then it is not possible to investigate it in that way.

original: dam bcas pa'i don gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i chos mnyan bya nyid thun mong ma yin par rigs kyi /
analyzed: dam bcas pa'i don gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i chos mnyan bya nyid thun mong ma yin par rigs kyi /
translated: It is reasonable that the uncommon property of the object of the thesis, being the object of hearing, is uncommon.

original: sgra la ni sgra nyid gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ma grub pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin no zhes gsungs pa ni legs par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra la ni sgra nyid gzhan nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ma grub pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyi skyon yin no zhes gsungs pa ni legs par bshad pa yin no //
translated: But since sound itself does not exist as different from sound itself, it is a fault of the reason that it is not established. This is a good explanation.

original: phyogs kyi mtshan nyid bshad zin to /üîΩ// / bam po bcu pa /
analyzed: phyogs kyi mtshan nyid bshad zin to / // / bam po bcu pa /
translated: The definition of the subject has been explained.

original: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ba yin no //
translated: The definition of the reason should be explained.

original: de la yang /
analyzed: de la yang /
translated: And in that regard,

original: gang phyir gtan tshigs dag dang ni //
analyzed: gang phyir gtan tshigs dag dang ni //
translated: because the reason and

original: de snang phal cher phyogs chos nyid //
analyzed: de snang phal cher phyogs chos nyid //
translated: the property of the subject appear to be mostly common,

original: des na gtan tshigs ltar snang gi //
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs ltar snang gi //
translated: therefore, like the apparent reason,

original: sngon du dbye bas bstan par bya //
analyzed: sngon du dbye bas bstan par bya //
translated: it should be taught by first dividing it.üîΩThe property of the subject, the similar class, and the dissimilar class,

original: phyogs chos mthun phyogs yod med dang // rnam gnyis re re dag la yang //
analyzed: phyogs chos mthun phyogs yod med dang // rnam gnyis re re dag la yang //
translated: each of the two,

original: rnam gsum mi mthun phyogs la yang //
analyzed: rnam gsum mi mthun phyogs la yang //
translated: The three modes are also in the discordant class,

original: yod med rnam pa gnyis phyir ro //üîΩgal te / de la mthun phyogs la yod dang // rnam gnyis de med la med gang //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang / gtan tshigs @222a * //
analyzed: yod med rnam pa gnyis phyir ro // gal te / de la mthun phyogs la yod dang // rnam gnyis de med la med gang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang / gtan tshigs @222a * //
translated: because there are two types: existent and nonexistent.üîΩIf someone says, ‚ÄúAren‚Äôt the definition of a reason and the definition of a pseudo-reason, such as ‚ÄòThat which is a property of the position and is of two types, and that which is nonexistent in the absence of the property of the position,‚Äô

original: ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid dag kho na brjod par bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid dag kho na brjod par bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: to be stated?‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir phyogs chos kyi dbye ba bstan zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir phyogs chos kyi dbye ba bstan zhe na /
translated: Why is the division of the property of the position taught?

original: gtan tshigs dag dang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba phal mo che ni phyogs kyi chos nyid yin pa des na gtan tshigs dang / gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid bye brag tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir dang po phyogs chos kyi dbye ba bstan te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs dag dang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba phal mo che ni phyogs kyi chos nyid yin pa des na gtan tshigs dang / gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid bye brag tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir dang po phyogs chos kyi dbye ba bstan te /
translated: Since most reasons and pseudo-reasons are the property of the position, in order to clearly teach the definitions of reasons and pseudo-reasons in particular, the division of the property of the position is taught first.

original: de ltar yin dang phyogs kyi chos 'di ni gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: de ltar yin dang phyogs kyi chos 'di ni gtan tshigs so //
translated: If that is so, then this property of the position is a reason.

original: 'di ni gsal ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsal ba'o //
translated: This is a clear statement.

original: 'di ni ma nges pa yin no zhes bde bar 'chad pa dang 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni ma nges pa yin no zhes bde bar 'chad pa dang 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will easily explain and understand this, saying, This is not definite.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /üîΩgtan tshigs rab tu dbye ba'i don //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa / gtan tshigs rab tu dbye ba'i don //
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: bde bar gzung ba grub bya'i phyir //
analyzed: bde bar gzung ba grub bya'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of easily grasping the meaning of the division of reasons,

original: phyogs chos rab tu dbye ba yis //
analyzed: phyogs chos rab tu dbye ba yis //
translated: the division of the property of the subject

original: mdor bsdus pa ni gsungs pa yin //
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa ni gsungs pa yin //
translated: is briefly taught.

original: phyogs kyi rab tu dbye bas bsdus te bshad pa gang yin pa de ni gtan tshigs kyi rab tu dbye ba'i don nyid bde blag tu gzung ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: phyogs kyi rab tu dbye bas bsdus te bshad pa gang yin pa de ni gtan tshigs kyi rab tu dbye ba'i don nyid bde blag tu gzung ba'i don du'o //
translated: The meaning of the division of reasons is for the sake of easily grasping the division of reasons itself.

original: gtan tshigs kyi rab tu dbye ba ni ;
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi rab tu dbye ba ni ;
translated: The division of reasons

original: gtan tshigs dang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
translated: is the teaching of the definition of reasons and fallacious reasons.

original: de'i don ni gtan tshigs dang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid de /
analyzed: de'i don ni gtan tshigs dang gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid de /
translated: The meaning of that is the definition of reasons and fallacious reasons.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang gi / sngon du zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang gi / sngon du zhes gsungs so //
translated: it is said that fallacious reasons are taught first.

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ngo //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ngo //
translated: A fallacious reason is a fallacious reason.

original: ltar snang ni 'dir nye ba'i phyogs gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin gyi /
analyzed: ltar snang ni 'dir nye ba'i phyogs gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin gyi /
translated: The term ‚Äúseeming‚Äù here refers to the seeming reason that is a similar instance.üîΩ

original: ltar snang ba tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ltar snang ba tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: The term ‚Äúseeming‚Äù here refers to a seeming proof, not to a mere seeming.

original: gal te chos can gyi chos tsam du nye bar bsdus pa'i chos sgrub par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te chos can gyi chos tsam du nye bar bsdus pa'i chos sgrub par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: If the property of the subject is established as merely subsumed within the subject,

original: phyogs kyi chos nyid du nye bar bsdus pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos nyid du nye bar bsdus pa ni ma yin te /
translated: but not as subsumed within the property of the subject,

original: nags tshang tshing la sogs pa'i phyogs 'di na du ba yod do zhes chos can tsam la nye bar ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nags tshang tshing la sogs pa'i phyogs 'di na du ba yod do zhes chos can tsam la nye bar ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then it is like the statement, ‚ÄúIn this place, a forest thicket and so on, there is smoke,‚Äù where the mere subject is indicated.

original: chos can tsam ni phyogs ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can tsam ni phyogs ma yin no //
translated: The mere subject is not the subject.

original: chos can ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te sgrub pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi khyad par can gyi chos can bsgrub bya yin no zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: chos can ni bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te sgrub pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi khyad par can gyi chos can bsgrub bya yin no zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: The subject is not the probandum because it is the proof, and because it has been explained that the subject that possesses the property is the probandum.

original: de ni bden te /
analyzed: de ni bden te /
translated: That is true,

original: tshogs don bsgrub bya nyid yin phyir //
analyzed: tshogs don bsgrub bya nyid yin phyir //
translated: but the collection is the probandum.

original: gtso bo min yang chos tsam ni ;
analyzed: gtso bo min yang chos tsam ni ;
translated: The mere property, although not the main thing,

original: / chos can tsam la phyogs gcig phyir //
analyzed: / chos can tsam la phyogs gcig phyir //
translated: is the subject in one part.

original: bsgrub bya nyid du nye bar 'dogs //
analyzed: bsgrub bya nyid du nye bar 'dogs //
translated: The subject is designated as the probandum.

original: gtan tshigs kyi byed pa'i yul tshogs pa ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi byed pa'i yul tshogs pa ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: The locus of the operation of the reason is the probandum.

original: de yang phyogs ma yin te grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang phyogs ma yin te grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But that is not the case, because it is established.

original: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ma grub pa'i chos can de'i khyad par can ni phyogs yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ma grub pa'i chos can de'i khyad par can ni phyogs yin no //
translated: Therefore, the subject that is not established as having the property to be proved is the subject.

original: @222b ji ltar ma grub pa'i khyad par yin zhe na /
analyzed: @222b ji ltar ma grub pa'i khyad par yin zhe na /
translated: How is it not established?

original: nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is designated.

original: dgos pa med pa'i phyir nye bar btags par mi bya'o zhes bya ba yang 'brel pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dgos pa med pa'i phyir nye bar btags par mi bya'o zhes bya ba yang 'brel pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not related to say that it should not be designated because it is purposeless.

original: ma yin te chos can kyi chos thams cad yin pa dgag pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bstan zin pa nyid pas yang mi brjod do //
analyzed: ma yin te chos can kyi chos thams cad yin pa dgag pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bstan zin pa nyid pas yang mi brjod do //
translated: No, because it is already explained above that it is in order to refute that all properties of the subject are established.

original: de ltar yin na mig gis gzung bar bya ba la sogs pa spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yin na mig gis gzung bar bya ba la sogs pa spangs pa yin no //
translated: If that were so, it would be excluded from being perceptible by the eye and so on.

original: gal te mig gis gzung bya nyid mthun pa'i phyogs kho na la yod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te mig gis gzung bya nyid mthun pa'i phyogs kho na la yod pa yin gyi /
translated: If being perceptible by the eye exists only in the similar class,

original: chos can gyi chos ni ma yin pas /
analyzed: chos can gyi chos ni ma yin pas /
translated: but not the property of the subject.

original: de las de ni chos can smos pa nyid kyis sel ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: de las de ni chos can smos pa nyid kyis sel ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: So, isn‚Äôt that excluded by the mere mention of the subject?

original: nye bar btags pa dang bral ba'i chos can smos pa ni bsgrub bya'i chos can nyid du mi 'grub po //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa dang bral ba'i chos can smos pa ni bsgrub bya'i chos can nyid du mi 'grub po //
translated: When the subject is mentioned without being figuratively designated, it is not established as the subject of the probandum.

original: chos mi mthun pa'i dpe'i chos can gyi chos zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa'i dpe'i chos can gyi chos zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And it would be the property of the subject of the dissimilar example.

original: ma yin te med la med ces bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te med la med ces bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because it is explained that it does not exist in the absence of that.

original: ji ltar de nyid la yod pa dang de nyid la med ces bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar de nyid la yod pa dang de nyid la med ces bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: How could it be that it exists in that and does not exist in that?

original: de'i phyir 'os gzhan med pas na chos can gsum pa yongs su gzung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'os gzhan med pas na chos can gsum pa yongs su gzung ngo //
translated: Therefore, since there is no other option, the third subject is accepted.

original: de yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can kho na'o //
analyzed: de yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can kho na'o //
translated: And that is only the subject of the probandum.

original: ma yin te /üîΩdpe'i chos can nyid la yod par nges par bya ba'i don yin par dogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma yin te / dpe'i chos can nyid la yod par nges par bya ba'i don yin par dogs par 'gyur te /
translated: No,üîΩbecause there is the doubt that it is the purpose of ascertaining that it exists in the subject of the example.

original: yang brjod pa ni nges par gzung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: yang brjod pa ni nges par gzung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
translated: And the repetition is for the purpose of emphasizing that.

original: gal te yang brjod pa med pa yang nges par gzung ba nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te yang brjod pa med pa yang nges par gzung ba nyid ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the absence of expression also ascertained?

original: mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa zhes nges par gzung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs nyid la yod pa zhes nges par gzung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the presence in the similar class is ascertained.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa nyid ces bya bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa nyid ces bya bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be the presence in the similar class.

original: des de nyid la yod ces nges par gzung ba'i phyir yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des de nyid la yod ces nges par gzung ba'i phyir yin par 'gyur te /
translated: Because the presence in that itself is ascertained by that.

original: des na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yongs su gzung ba'i don du nye bar btags pa yin no //
analyzed: des na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can yongs su gzung ba'i don du nye bar btags pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is a designation for the purpose of apprehending the subject of the probandum.

original: 'o na bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi chos nyid smos par bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na bsgrub bya'i chos can gyi chos nyid smos par bya'o zhe na /
translated: But the property of the subject of the probandum should be stated.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: de la yang nye bar btags pa nyid skyabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang nye bar btags pa nyid skyabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the designation itself is the refuge.

original: ma grub pa ni sgro btags pa med par khyad par du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ma grub pa ni sgro btags pa med par khyad par du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: The unestablished does not become distinguished without superimposition.

original: phyogs zhes bya ba 'dis kyang de nyid brjod pa'i phyir khyad par ci yod /
analyzed: phyogs zhes bya ba 'dis kyang de nyid brjod pa'i phyir khyad par ci yod /
translated: And because this ‚Äúposition‚Äù also expresses that, what is the distinction?

original: ming dang ming can gyi 'brel pa sgrub pa'i 'bad pas dka' ba'i skyon yod do zhe na /
analyzed: ming dang ming can gyi 'brel pa sgrub pa'i 'bad pas dka' ba'i skyon yod do zhe na /
translated: But there is the fault of difficulty, because of the effort to establish the relation between the name and the named.

original: ma yin te phyogs kyi sgra yang bsgrub par bya ba'i rnam grangs yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde ltar yang skye bo dag 'di nyid phyogs yin te 'dod par bya ba ni 'di nyid do @223a * //
analyzed: ma yin te phyogs kyi sgra yang bsgrub par bya ba'i rnam grangs yin pa'i phyir ro // de ltar yang skye bo dag 'di nyid phyogs yin te 'dod par bya ba ni 'di nyid do @223a * //
translated: No, because the term ‚Äúside‚Äù is a synonym of ‚Äúprobandum.‚Äù

original: zhes tha snyad byed pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes tha snyad byed pa yin no //
translated: Thus, people use the expression, ‚ÄúThis is the side,‚Äù and ‚ÄúThis is the probandum.‚Äù

original: de ltar yang slob dpon gyis /
analyzed: de ltar yang slob dpon gyis /
translated: And so the master [DignƒÅga] says,

original: tshogs don bsgrub bya nyid yin phyir //
analyzed: tshogs don bsgrub bya nyid yin phyir //
translated: Because the object of the collection is the probandum,

original: gtso bo min yang chos sam ni //üîΩchos can tsam la phyogs gcig phyir //
analyzed: gtso bo min yang chos sam ni // chos can tsam la phyogs gcig phyir //
translated: Even though it is not the principal,üîΩThe property or the mere subject is suspected

original: bsgrub bya nyid du nye bar dogs //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: bsgrub bya nyid du nye bar dogs // zhes gsungs so //
translated: Of being the probandum because of being one side.

original: nye bar btags pa med pa'i chos can rkyang pa ni phyogs ma yin no //
analyzed: nye bar btags pa med pa'i chos can rkyang pa ni phyogs ma yin no //
translated: A mere subject without an added property is not a side.

original: gal te chos kyi khyad par can gyi chos can rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te chos kyi khyad par can gyi chos can rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the subject that is qualified by the property to be proven the object to be inferred?

original: de la ni de btags pa srid pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de la ni de btags pa srid pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: And it is not possible to add that to it.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: der ni shes par 'dod pa'i chos kyi khyad par can zhes bya bar bsams pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der ni shes par 'dod pa'i chos kyi khyad par can zhes bya bar bsams pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the distinguished is intended to be the phenomenon that is to be known.

original: de ltar ni rjes su dpag par 'os pas na rjes su dpag pa yin no zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar ni rjes su dpag par 'os pas na rjes su dpag pa yin no zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The connection is that inference is so called because it is suitable to infer.

original: rjes su dpag par 'os pa gang yin pa dang / shes par 'dod pa'i khyad par gang yin pa de ni bsgrub par bya ba yin pas ma grub pa'i phyir nye bar btags pa nyid do //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par 'os pa gang yin pa dang / shes par 'dod pa'i khyad par gang yin pa de ni bsgrub par bya ba yin pas ma grub pa'i phyir nye bar btags pa nyid do //
translated: Since the distinguished that is to be known and the distinguished that is suitable to infer are the probandum, they are merely imputed because they are not established.

original: de'i phyir nye bar btags pa'i don nyid phyogs yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nye bar btags pa'i don nyid phyogs yin no //
translated: Therefore the mere imputed object is the subject.

original: nye bar btags pas bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa'i khyad par can nyid kyi chos can ni phyogs yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: nye bar btags pas bsgrub par bya bar 'dod pa'i khyad par can nyid kyi chos can ni phyogs yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The distinguished that is to be established by the imputation is the subject means the subject is the subject.

original: gal te nye bar btags pa'i khyad par gyi chos can ni chos zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te nye bar btags pa'i khyad par gyi chos can ni chos zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If the distinguished that is imputed is also called the phenomenon,

original: phyogs smos par ni bsgrub bya'i chos can yin par yongs su gzung ba'i don te /
analyzed: phyogs smos par ni bsgrub bya'i chos can yin par yongs su gzung ba'i don te /
translated: The term ‚Äúsubject‚Äù is used to refer to the probandum.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can ni chos gang yin pa de nyid gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can ni chos gang yin pa de nyid gtan tshigs dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa yin te /
translated: The probandum is the property that is the subject of the inference. The reason is contradictory and inconclusive with respect to that property.

original: phyogs de'i chos ni phyogs chos yin no //
analyzed: phyogs de'i chos ni phyogs chos yin no //
translated: The property of the subject is called the property of the position.

original: gal te khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po 'di la khyad par ni gzhan rnam par gcod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan gyi chos nyid yin par bkag pas na thams cad thun mong ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos po 'di la khyad par ni gzhan rnam par gcod par byed pa yin pa'i phyir gzhan gyi chos nyid yin par bkag pas na thams cad thun mong ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If the relation between qualifier and qualified is such that the qualifier is the exclusion of another, then the qualifier is the property of another. Therefore, everything would be unique.

original: rnam par gcod par byed pa ma yin pa ni khyad par ma yin no //üîΩbyas pa sgra'i khyad par can ni sgra'i bdag nyid yin pas ji ltar bum pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid dam /
analyzed: rnam par gcod par byed pa ma yin pa ni khyad par ma yin no // byas pa sgra'i khyad par can ni sgra'i bdag nyid yin pas ji ltar bum pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid dam /
translated: That which is not an exclusion is not a qualifier.

original: de la 'jug par 'gyur /
analyzed: de la 'jug par 'gyur /
translated: Since the qualifier of sound, ‚Äúproduced,‚Äù is of the nature of sound, how can it be the nature of a pot, or how can it be related to a pot?üîΩIf it is different from sound, then it is not the qualifier of sound.

original: tha dad pa yin na brgya lam na 'gyur ba yang yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa yin na brgya lam na 'gyur ba yang yin no //
translated: If it is different, then it is possible that it is the qualifier of sound.

original: chos rnams ni chos can las tha dad par 'dod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos rnams ni chos can las tha dad par 'dod pa ma yin no //
translated: The property is not asserted to be different from the subject.

original: tha dad pa ni rgyu las gzhan khyad par du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa ni rgyu las gzhan khyad par du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Difference does not become a distinction from another cause.

original: de ltar gyur na thams cad 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na thams cad 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were the case, everything would be a reason for the effect.

original: de'i phyir khyad par yin na ni thun mong ma yin pa nyid do//
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par yin na ni thun mong ma yin pa nyid do//
translated: Therefore, if it is a distinction, it is not common.

original: @223b khyad par ma yin na yang phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon du thal lo zhe na /
analyzed: @223b khyad par ma yin na yang phyogs kyi chos ma yin pa'i phyir ma grub pa nyid kyi skyon du thal lo zhe na /
translated: If it is not a distinction, then because it is not a property of the subject, the fault of non-establishment would follow.

original: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not the case.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / chos tshig phrad tha dad byed pas //
analyzed: 'di ltar / chos tshig phrad tha dad byed pas //
translated: By making the property a different phrase,

original: mi ldan gzhan dang ldan pa dang // shin tu mi srid rnam gcod byed //
analyzed: mi ldan gzhan dang ldan pa dang // shin tu mi srid rnam gcod byed //
translated: Non-possession, possession of another, and utter impossibility are excluded.

original: gal te rnam par gcad par bya ba dang rnam par gcod par byed pa'i dngos po gcig nyid du zad na skyon 'dir 'gyur ba zhig na rnam pa ni du mar mthong ste /
analyzed: gal te rnam par gcad par bya ba dang rnam par gcod par byed pa'i dngos po gcig nyid du zad na skyon 'dir 'gyur ba zhig na rnam pa ni du mar mthong ste /
translated: If the object of exclusion and the means of exclusion were exhausted in being the same, this fault would occur. But the aspects are seen to be many.

original: kha cig tu ni ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod par byed la /üîΩkha cig tu ni gzhan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: kha cig tu ni ma 'brel pa rnam par gcod par byed la / kha cig tu ni gzhan dang ldan pa /
translated: In some cases, it is a matter of excluding what is not related.üîΩIn some cases, it is a matter of excluding what is related to something else.

original: kha cig tu ni shin tu mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i phyir tha dad do //
analyzed: kha cig tu ni shin tu mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i phyir tha dad do //
translated: In some cases, it is a matter of excluding what is not related at all.

original: ldog par byed pa'i tshig phrad kyis ni rnam par gcad par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: ldog par byed pa'i tshig phrad kyis ni rnam par gcad par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: The words that exclude are used to exclude,

original: gcig tu nges par gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig tu nges par gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but they do not necessarily exclude what is related to something else.

original: de'i don ni nges par bzung ba tsam yin la /
analyzed: de'i don ni nges par bzung ba tsam yin la /
translated: The meaning of the words is simply to specify,

original: gzhan du nges par bzung ba la skyon yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du nges par bzung ba la skyon yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: and there is no fault in specifying something else.

original: rnam par dbye ba 'di ga las yin te /
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba 'di ga las yin te /
translated: How is this distinction known?

original: brjod pa'i rnam pa gcig la don tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: brjod pa'i rnam pa gcig la don tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because there is no difference in meaning in the single expression.

original: 'ba' zhig gi don tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig gi don tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The meaning is not different,

original: 'on kyang 'brel pa can tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'brel pa can tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: but because the related things are different.

original: 'brel pa can tha dad pa ni //
analyzed: 'brel pa can tha dad pa ni //
translated: The related things are differentüîΩbecause of the difference between the qualifier and the qualified,

original: khyad par khyad par can dag dang // bya ba dang ni lhan cig brjod //
analyzed: khyad par khyad par can dag dang // bya ba dang ni lhan cig brjod //
translated: and because of the difference between the action and the thing possessing the action.

original: gtso bo ni 'brel pa can nyid yin te /
analyzed: gtso bo ni 'brel pa can nyid yin te /
translated: The principal is the very related object.

original: 'di ltar / de sbyar med kyang brjod 'dod las //
analyzed: 'di ltar / de sbyar med kyang brjod 'dod las //
translated: Thus, even though it is not connected,

original: de yi don ni rtogs par 'gyur //üîΩkhyad par dang lhan cig brjod pas ni mi ldan pa rnam par gcod par byed la /
analyzed: de yi don ni rtogs par 'gyur // khyad par dang lhan cig brjod pas ni mi ldan pa rnam par gcod par byed la /
translated: the meaning of that is understood from what is desired to be said.üîΩBy expressing the qualifier together, the non-possessor is excluded.

original: khyad par can dang lhan cig brjod pas ni gzhan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: khyad par can dang lhan cig brjod pas ni gzhan dang ldan pa /
translated: By expressing the qualified together, the possessor of another is excluded.

original: bya ba dang lhan cig pas ni gtan mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa yin no zhes go rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'brel to //üîΩnges par gzung ba na khyad par la sogs pa'i tshig nyid kyis ston par byed la /
analyzed: bya ba dang lhan cig pas ni gtan mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa yin no zhes go rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'brel to // nges par gzung ba na khyad par la sogs pa'i tshig nyid kyis ston par byed la /
translated: By expressing the action together, the utter non-possessor is excluded. Thus, they are related in the proper order.üîΩWhen specifying, the words such as the qualifier itself are used to show.

original: tshig phrad ni de gsal bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: tshig phrad ni de gsal bar byed pa yin te /
translated: The prefix clarifies that.

original: des ni de nyid mngon par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des ni de nyid mngon par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it makes that very thing manifest.

original: 'di ltar bum par chu khyer la shog ces bya bas /
analyzed: 'di ltar bum par chu khyer la shog ces bya bas /
translated: Thus, when it is said Bring water in a pot,

original: gal te byed pa'i khyad par min par 'phen pa na khyad par byed pa don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te byed pa'i khyad par min par 'phen pa na khyad par byed pa don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: if the qualifier is not the agent, then the qualifier would be meaningless when projected.

original: de bzhin du las la sogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du las la sogs pa yang ngo //
translated: So too, with regard to action, etc.

original: de bas na nges par gzung ba na bum pa la sogs pa'i tshig gis rtogs pa nyid la de dag kyang tha dad pas don tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na nges par gzung ba na bum pa la sogs pa'i tshig gis rtogs pa nyid la de dag kyang tha dad pas don tha dad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, when there is a specification, the words ‚Äúpot,‚Äù etc., are understood to be different from each other, and thus they have different meanings.

original: gal te de dag tha dad pas ni don tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te de dag tha dad pas ni don tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: But if they are different, don‚Äôt they have different meanings?

original: nges par bzung ba ni thun mong ma yin pa nyid du rtogs te /
analyzed: nges par bzung ba ni thun mong ma yin pa nyid du rtogs te /
translated: A specification is understood to be a non-commonality.

original: @224a * // des na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las tha dad par brtags pas nges par bzung ba ni tshig phrad kyi brjod bya nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: @224a * // des na rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las tha dad par brtags pas nges par bzung ba ni tshig phrad kyi brjod bya nyid do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, since it is imagined to be different from the positive and negative concomitance, a specification is the topic of a compound word.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: de ma sbyar na mi rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma sbyar na mi rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow, absurdly, that without the specification one would not understand.

original: gang zhig gang med kyang rtogs pa de ni ji ltar de'i don yin /
analyzed: gang zhig gang med kyang rtogs pa de ni ji ltar de'i don yin /
translated: How can that which is understood even when it is not present be the meaning of that?

original: 'o na ji ltar tha dad par brjod pa dag brjod par bya ba tha dad pa med par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar tha dad par brjod pa dag brjod par bya ba tha dad pa med par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: Well then, how can words that are expressed as different have a non-different referent?

original: rnam par gcod pa nyid ni sgra'i brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa nyid ni sgra'i brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Exclusion itself is not the expressed meaning of a word,

original: de'i brjod par bya ba ni dngos po yin pa'i phyir dang / rnam par gcod pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i brjod par bya ba ni dngos po yin pa'i phyir dang / rnam par gcod pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because its expressed meaning is a thing, and because exclusion has the nature of a non-thing.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: gang phyir dag 'bras rnam gcod phyir //
analyzed: gang phyir dag 'bras rnam gcod phyir //
translated: because the result of purification is exclusion.

original: dper na nag pa 'phong skyon pa'am //üîΩsrid sgrub 'phong skyen zhes pa'am //
analyzed: dper na nag pa 'phong skyon pa'am // srid sgrub 'phong skyen zhes pa'am //
translated: For example, ‚ÄúBalƒ±ka is a bad archer,‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúArjuna is a good archer,‚Äù

original: sngon po mtsho skyes 'gyur zhes bzhin //
analyzed: sngon po mtsho skyes 'gyur zhes bzhin //
translated: or ‚Äúthe blue lotus is born in water.‚Äù

original: phan tshun don 'brel pa can gyi tshig gi tshogs ni dag go //
analyzed: phan tshun don 'brel pa can gyi tshig gi tshogs ni dag go //
translated: A collection of words that are mutually related in meaning is a sentence.

original: 'dir ni dag rdzogs par byed pa'i tshig nyid dag gi sgras brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni dag rdzogs par byed pa'i tshig nyid dag gi sgras brjod pa yin te /
translated: Here, the word ‚Äúpurification‚Äù expresses the very words that complete the purification,

original: de dag nyid rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa'i phyir dang / de las gzhan pa'i dag kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag nyid rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can yin pa'i phyir dang / de las gzhan pa'i dag kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they have the result of purification and because there is no other purification than that.

original: dag gang gis 'bras bu gang yin pa de nyid de'i bstan par bya ba yin pas na don ni de nyid yin no //
analyzed: dag gang gis 'bras bu gang yin pa de nyid de'i bstan par bya ba yin pas na don ni de nyid yin no //
translated: Since the meaning of the statement is that the very thing that is the cause of the effect is the object of expression, the meaning is just that.

original: rnam par gcod pa yang rnam par gcad pa las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa yang rnam par gcad pa las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: And the exclusion is not different from the exclusion.

original: des na rnam par gcod par bya ba'i don rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na rnam par gcod par bya ba'i don rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in order to understand the object of exclusion,

original: de dang tha dad pa med pas rnam par gcod par yang rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de dang tha dad pa med pas rnam par gcod par yang rtogs pa yin te /
translated: since it is not different from that, the exclusion is also understood.

original: des na rnam par gcod pa nyid bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des na rnam par gcod pa nyid bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the exclusion itself is the object of expression.

original: ci ste bstan par bya ba ni dngos po yin la /
analyzed: ci ste bstan par bya ba ni dngos po yin la /
translated: But if the object of expression is a thing,

original: rnam par gcod pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin tshad ma gzhan gyis rtogs par bya ba 'phen pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin tshad ma gzhan gyis rtogs par bya ba 'phen pa yin la /
translated: and the exclusion is the nature of a non-thing, which is to be understood by another valid cognition, and

original: 'phangs pa de ni kho na'i sgra la sogs pas gsal bar byed do zhe na /
analyzed: 'phangs pa de ni kho na'i sgra la sogs pas gsal bar byed do zhe na /
translated: that which is implied is made clear by words such as ‚Äúonly,‚Äù

original: de yang mi rung ste /üîΩji ltar / gzhan brjod pas ni ma 'brel pa //
analyzed: de yang mi rung ste / ji ltar / gzhan brjod pas ni ma 'brel pa //
translated: then that is also unacceptable.üîΩBecause how could it be said thatüîΩthe other is not related?

original: gzhan ni 'phen par ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan ni 'phen par ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: How could the other be implied?

original: 'brel pa med kyang 'phen na ni //
analyzed: 'brel pa med kyang 'phen na ni //
translated: If it were implied even without a relation,üîΩthen it would be implied even by the word ‚Äúonly.‚Äù

original: ha cang thal ba bzlog pa med //
analyzed: ha cang thal ba bzlog pa med //
translated: The absurd consequence would follow that there would be no way to avoid the fault of overextension.

original: gal te ldog pa ldog pa dang ldan pa las tha dad pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te ldog pa ldog pa dang ldan pa las tha dad pa ma yin na /
translated: If the exclusion is not different from that which possesses the exclusion,

original: de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir 'phen par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir 'phen par 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be projected because it would be identical to that.

original: tha dad kyang 'brel pa'i phyir 'phen no zhe na /
analyzed: tha dad kyang 'brel pa'i phyir 'phen no zhe na /
translated: But if it is different, it is projected because of the connection.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: tha dad na dngos po gzhan las ldog pa med par mngon sum gyis rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad na dngos po gzhan las ldog pa med par mngon sum gyis rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is different, it would follow that it is directly perceived that there is no exclusion from other things.

original: de'i phyir dngos po med pa'i tshad mas @224b gzhan gyis ldog pa rtogs pa yin na yang /
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po med pa'i tshad mas @224b gzhan gyis ldog pa rtogs pa yin na yang /
translated: Therefore, even though the exclusion is cognized by a valid cognition of nonexistence,

original: de dang 'brel pa med pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa med pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: it is cognized as not being connected to that.

original: ldog pa med pa dang / ldog pa ni 'brel par rtogs nus pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: ldog pa med pa dang / ldog pa ni 'brel par rtogs nus pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And it is not possible to cognize the exclusion and the object as being connected.

original: 'on te tha dad kyang tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i phyir ldog pa dang don lhan cig nyid du skye ba yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te tha dad kyang tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i phyir ldog pa dang don lhan cig nyid du skye ba yin no snyam na /
translated: But if it is different, the exclusion and the object are produced simultaneously because they depend on the same collection.

original: de ni mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de ni mi 'thad de /
translated: That is not tenable.

original: 'di ltar / de tha dad pas don de ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / de tha dad pas don de ni //
translated: Because of that difference, that object

original: rang nyid rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rang nyid rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir //
translated: because it is the object that is followed.

original: gzhan yod pas ni tha mi dad //
analyzed: gzhan yod pas ni tha mi dad //
translated: The difference is not due to the existence of another.

original: tha dad par ni 'gyur mi 'os //
analyzed: tha dad par ni 'gyur mi 'os //
translated: It is not possible that there is difference.

original: rva 'di ni rva 'di yin no zhes khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos por 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rva 'di ni rva 'di yin no zhes khyad par dang khyad par can gyi dngos por 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: This horn is not that horn, because there is no difference in the nature of the two horns.

original: dus mnyan pa nyid kyis na gnyi ga yang phan tshun rnam par 'chad par rtogs pa'i phyir dang / 'di'o zhes bya ba nyid tsam du 'gyur gyi khyad par dang khyad par can gyi ngo bo ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dus mnyan pa nyid kyis na gnyi ga yang phan tshun rnam par 'chad par rtogs pa'i phyir dang / 'di'o zhes bya ba nyid tsam du 'gyur gyi khyad par dang khyad par can gyi ngo bo ni ma yin no //
translated: If there were difference, the two horns would be perceived as separate at the same time, and there would be the mere perception of this horn, not the perception of the difference between the two horns.

original: phan tshun phan 'dogs pa nyid yin na dus mi mtshungs pa nyid do //
analyzed: phan tshun phan 'dogs pa nyid yin na dus mi mtshungs pa nyid do //
translated: If there were mutual benefit, there would be difference in time.

original: gzhi dang gzhi can gyi dngos po ni khyad par dang khyad par can gyi ngo bo'i rgyu mtshan yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhi dang gzhi can gyi dngos po ni khyad par dang khyad par can gyi ngo bo'i rgyu mtshan yin no zhe na /
translated: The reason for the difference between the two horns is the relation of container and contained.

original: ma yin te /üîΩbla 'og tu ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te / bla 'og tu ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, becauseüîΩthe two horns are not perceived as above and below.

original: ldog pa'i dbus su dngos po rtogs pa'i phyir gzhi dang gzhi can gyi dngos po yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ldog pa'i dbus su dngos po rtogs pa'i phyir gzhi dang gzhi can gyi dngos po yin no zhe na /
translated: The reason for the difference between the two horns is the relation of container and contained, because the object is perceived in the middle of the container.

original: gal te 'di ltar na 'brel par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar na 'brel par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then the relation would not be understood.

original: gang zhig gang gi dbus na gnas pa de'i de yin no zhes bsnyad pa ni ma yin te ;üîΩbum pa'i mun pa dang snang ba zhe 'am /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi dbus na gnas pa de'i de yin no zhes bsnyad pa ni ma yin te ; bum pa'i mun pa dang snang ba zhe 'am /
translated: It is not said that ‚Äúthat which is located in the middle of this is that.‚ÄùüîΩFor example, it is not said that ‚Äúthe darkness or the light of the pot is the cloth,‚Äù

original: snam bu'i dbus na gnas pa na bum pa'i snam bu zhes tha snyad byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: snam bu'i dbus na gnas pa na bum pa'i snam bu zhes tha snyad byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: or that ‚Äúthe pot is the cloth located in the middle of the cloth.‚Äù

original: dngos po med pa'i dbus ni gdon mi za bar gnas par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i dbus ni gdon mi za bar gnas par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Undoubtedly, the middle of a nonentity would be located.

original: dngos po med pa mod na ni snam bu la segs pa dbus su gnas par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa mod na ni snam bu la segs pa dbus su gnas par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If there were no nonentity, the cloth, etc. would not be located in the middle of the cloth,

original: de'i khyad par nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de'i khyad par nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that it would be its own particular.

original: 'o na ni dngos po med pa gzhan med par dngos po med pa'i dbus su gnas par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na ni dngos po med pa gzhan med par dngos po med pa'i dbus su gnas par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Well then, without another nonentity, the nonentity would not be located in the middle of the nonentity,

original: khyab par thal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab par thal ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that it would pervade it.

original: don der ni ngo bos ni dngos po med pa'i dbus su yang gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don der ni ngo bos ni dngos po med pa'i dbus su yang gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: In that case, it would not be located in the middle of the nonentity by way of its own nature.

original: gang zhig gang na gnas pa de ni /
analyzed: gang zhig gang na gnas pa de ni /
translated: That which is located in this

original: gzhi las tha dad pa'i dngos po med par mi 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: gzhi las tha dad pa'i dngos po med par mi 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: It would not be the case that there is no entity that is different from the basis.

original: dper na snam bu'i dbus na gnas pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na snam bu'i dbus na gnas pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the middle of a cloth.

original: dngos po med pa'i dbus na gnas pa yang dbus na gnas pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i dbus na gnas pa yang dbus na gnas pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
translated: And the middle of a non-entity is also the middle itself. This is a natural inference.

original: gal te dngos po med pa'i dbus su ni rang nyid gnas @225a * //üîΩpa yin te /
analyzed: gal te dngos po med pa'i dbus su ni rang nyid gnas @225a * // pa yin te /
translated: If the middle of a non-entity is itself,üîΩthen it is the middle of a non-entity.

original: dngos po med pa ni rang nyid de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni rang nyid de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a non-entity is itself the nature of that.

original: la cha shing sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir de la yang shing dang sbyor bar byed pa gzhan yod par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: la cha shing sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir de la yang shing dang sbyor bar byed pa gzhan yod par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
translated: And because it is connected to wood, it is not the case that there is another wood-connector there.

original: rang nyid de lta bur gyur pa yin pa'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rang nyid de lta bur gyur pa yin pa'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Because it itself is like that.üîΩThus,

original: 'di ltar / la cha ngo bo nyid kyis ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / la cha ngo bo nyid kyis ni //
translated: By its own nature,

original: mes bzhus shing sbyor byed pa yin //
analyzed: mes bzhus shing sbyor byed pa yin //
translated: it is connected to fire.

original: dngos po med ngo bo nyid kyis ni //
analyzed: dngos po med ngo bo nyid kyis ni //
translated: By its own nature,

original: khyab pa'i byed par nus ma yin //
analyzed: khyab pa'i byed par nus ma yin //
translated: a non-entity is not able to be a pervader.

original: gal te dngos po khyab min na //
analyzed: gal te dngos po khyab min na //
translated: If an entity is not pervaded,

original: dngos po med pa don med 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos po med pa don med 'gyur //
translated: And the non-entity would be purposeless.

original: dngos po med pa'ang khyab yin na //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'ang khyab yin na //
translated: If the non-entity pervades,

original: gzhan de'i dbus su ji ltar gnas //
analyzed: gzhan de'i dbus su ji ltar gnas //
translated: how could it abide in the middle of the other?

original: dngos po med pa ni rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis khyab pa'i bar du gnas par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni rang gi ngo bo tsam gyis khyab pa'i bar du gnas par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The non-entity does not pervade up to the abiding of its own nature,

original: khyab pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that it pervades itself.

original: ma khyab pa nyid du 'dod do zhe na /
analyzed: ma khyab pa nyid du 'dod do zhe na /
translated: If you assert that it does not pervade,

original: de dngos po med pas ci bya dngos po med pa ni mi 'dre par bya ba'i don du 'dod pa yin na /
analyzed: de dngos po med pas ci bya dngos po med pa ni mi 'dre par bya ba'i don du 'dod pa yin na /
translated: what is the use of the non-entity? If the non-entity is asserted to be the object of non-mixing,

original: de ni dngos po rnams khyab pa ma yin pas na rang nyid grub pa'i phyir don med pa bzlog tu med do //
analyzed: de ni dngos po rnams khyab pa ma yin pas na rang nyid grub pa'i phyir don med pa bzlog tu med do //
translated: since it does not pervade entities, it is established by itself, so the purposelessness is unavoidable.

original: gal te dngos po med pa'am //
analyzed: gal te dngos po med pa'am //
translated: If the non-entity

original: dngos po med pa dang lhan cig pa'i rang gi rgyus ma khyab par byas so zhes bya ba la 'gal ba ci yod ce na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa dang lhan cig pa'i rang gi rgyus ma khyab par byas so zhes bya ba la 'gal ba ci yod ce na /
translated: or the non-entity together with the entity is not pervaded by its own cause, what is the contradiction?

original: de yang mi rung ste /üîΩgal te dngos po med pas don //
analyzed: de yang mi rung ste / gal te dngos po med pas don //
translated: That is also not correct.üîΩIf the non-entity pervades the object

original: khyab pa ma khyab par byed na //
analyzed: khyab pa ma khyab par byed na //
translated: and does not pervade,

original: sngar ni 'dres pa yod pa de //
analyzed: sngar ni 'dres pa yod pa de //
translated: But if it is mixed with something else,

original: phyi nas ji ltar gzhan du 'gyur //
analyzed: phyi nas ji ltar gzhan du 'gyur //
translated: how can it become something else later?

original: khyab pa ni ma khyab par bya nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khyab pa ni ma khyab par bya nus pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible to make what is all-pervading non-pervading.

original: don rnams sngar ma khyab pa nyid yin nam 'dres pa nyid do //
analyzed: don rnams sngar ma khyab pa nyid yin nam 'dres pa nyid do //
translated: Is it that the object was not previously pervaded, or is it that it is mixed?

original: 'on te sngar med pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te sngar med pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: Or is it that it did not exist previously?

original: 'o na 'di'i rang bzhin de lta bu yin par 'gyur te gzhan du mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'o na 'di'i rang bzhin de lta bu yin par 'gyur te gzhan du mthong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In that case, its nature would be like that, because it is not seen otherwise.

original: 'on te rang gi ngo bos ni khyab pa yang ma yin ma khyab pa yang ma yin gyi /üîΩkhyab pa nyid dang ldan pas ni //
analyzed: 'on te rang gi ngo bos ni khyab pa yang ma yin ma khyab pa yang ma yin gyi / khyab pa nyid dang ldan pas ni //
translated: But it is not that it is pervaded by its own nature, nor is it that it is not pervaded.

original: khyab par 'gyur la /
analyzed: khyab par 'gyur la /
translated: Rather, it becomes pervaded by that which possesses pervasion.

original: de med pa nyid dang ldan pas ni khyab pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de med pa nyid dang ldan pas ni khyab pa ma yin par 'gyur te /
translated: And it becomes non-pervading by possessing non-existence.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: ma 'dres bdag nyid dngos rnams la //
analyzed: ma 'dres bdag nyid dngos rnams la //
translated: The nature of things

original: tha dad tha mi dad do zhes //üîΩgzhan gyi khyad par can gyi ni //
analyzed: tha dad tha mi dad do zhes // gzhan gyi khyad par can gyi ni //
translated: is neither different nor non-different.üîΩThis proliferation of the other's distinction

original: spros pa 'di ni rtogs pa nyid //
analyzed: spros pa 'di ni rtogs pa nyid //
translated: is just conceptualization.

original: ces bshad pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ces bshad pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that,

original: de yang mi bzang ste /
analyzed: de yang mi bzang ste /
translated: that is also not good.

original: 'di ltar / gal te gnyis dang bral ba de //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te gnyis dang bral ba de //
translated: If that which is free from duality

original: gzhan du rtogs pa yin na ni //
analyzed: gzhan du rtogs pa yin na ni //
translated: Is understood as something else,

original: de'i tshe dngos de gzhan dang ldan //
analyzed: de'i tshe dngos de gzhan dang ldan //
translated: Then at that time, that thing would possess another,

original: gnyis la brten ces rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: gnyis la brten ces rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: And it would be understood as ‚Äúbased on the two.‚Äù

original: de ma yin na ni /
analyzed: de ma yin na ni /
translated: If it is not so,

original: dngos de las gzhan gnyis dang ni //
analyzed: dngos de las gzhan gnyis dang ni //
translated: Then that thing would be different from the two,

original: de @225b bzhin de yi 'brel pa gzhan //üîΩkhyad par rnams ni ma 'dres par //
analyzed: de @225b bzhin de yi 'brel pa gzhan // khyad par rnams ni ma 'dres par //
translated: And likewise, its relation to them would be different.üîΩThe distinctions would be understood

original: ngo bo nyid du rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid du rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: As essentially unmixed.

original: gal te de 'dres par rtogs na //
analyzed: gal te de 'dres par rtogs na //
translated: If it is understood as mixed,

original: de ltar na ni 'khrul par 'gyur //
analyzed: de ltar na ni 'khrul par 'gyur //
translated: Then it would be mistaken.

original: de lta na ni don med phyir //
analyzed: de lta na ni don med phyir //
translated: In that case, because it would be meaningless,

original: ma rig pa nyid tsam du 'gyur //
analyzed: ma rig pa nyid tsam du 'gyur //
translated: It would be mere ignorance.

original: khyad par dang ldan pa de yang khyad par rnams las rang nyid tha dad pa'i phyir khyad par gzhan rtogs pa ni don med do //
analyzed: khyad par dang ldan pa de yang khyad par rnams las rang nyid tha dad pa'i phyir khyad par gzhan rtogs pa ni don med do //
translated: Moreover, because that which possesses distinctions is itself distinct from the distinctions, it is meaningless to understand it as another distinction.

original: khyad par las rang nyid kho nas tha dad pa yin na /
analyzed: khyad par las rang nyid kho nas tha dad pa yin na /
translated: If it is itself distinct from the distinctions,

original: khyad par dang ldan pa gzhan las ni khyad par gyis tha dad pa zhes bya ba 'di la tshad ma ni cung zad kyang ma yin no //üîΩgal te rang gi ngo bos tha dad pa yod na tha dad pa de nyid khyad par dang ldan pas gzhan la ltos pa yang blta bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par dang ldan pa gzhan las ni khyad par gyis tha dad pa zhes bya ba 'di la tshad ma ni cung zad kyang ma yin no // gal te rang gi ngo bos tha dad pa yod na tha dad pa de nyid khyad par dang ldan pas gzhan la ltos pa yang blta bar bya ba'o //
translated: But in the case of a difference that is qualified by a difference, there is no evidence at all for the claim that it is different from the other.üîΩIf it exists as different by intrinsic nature, then that difference itself is qualified by difference, and so it must depend on another.

original: tha dad pa gzhan nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: tha dad pa gzhan nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is different from that difference,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: then it is not.

original: tha dad pa de snyed la dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa de snyed la dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no need for that many differences.

original: rang bzhin gyis ni tha dad phyir //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni tha dad phyir //
translated: Because of difference by intrinsic nature,

original: tha dad pas kun las ldog phyir //üîΩ'dir ni tha dad gzhan du yang //
analyzed: tha dad pas kun las ldog phyir // 'dir ni tha dad gzhan du yang //
translated: because of difference from all,

original: bstan pas yon tan ci zhig yod //
analyzed: bstan pas yon tan ci zhig yod //
translated: what is the point of teaching

original: 'on te 'di las kyang tha dad la /
analyzed: 'on te 'di las kyang tha dad la /
translated: that it is different from that difference?

original: 'di las kyang tha dad do zhes 'dod pa'i phyir tha dad par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di las kyang tha dad do zhes 'dod pa'i phyir tha dad par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: But if it is accepted that it is different from this and different from that, then it is understood to be different.

original: tshad mar grub pa'i don med kyang dor ba'i yul du rtag par nus pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: tshad mar grub pa'i don med kyang dor ba'i yul du rtag par nus pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Even if the object is not established as valid, it is not always possible to reject it.
